question: Ọbọgwụ Janet yiri àkwá iri na isii kwa ụbọchị. Ọ na-eri atọ maka nri ụtụtụ ọbụla ma jiri anọ gheere ndị enyị ya achịcha mọfịn kwa ụbọchị. Ọ na-ere ndị fọrọ n'ahia ndị ọrụ ugbo kwa ụbọchị $2 maka otu àkwá ọbọgwụ. Kedụ ego dọla ole ọ na-enweta kwa ụbọchị n'ahịa ndị ọrụ ugbo?
llm: <pad> Janet na-eri àkwá iri na isii kwa ụbọchị. Ọ na-eri àkwá atọ maka nri ụtụtụ ọbụla ma jiri anọ gheere ndị enyị ya achịcha mọfịn kwa ụbọchị. Ọ na-ere àkwá ndị fọrọ n'ahịa ndị ọrụ ugbo kwa ụbọchị $2 maka otu àkwá ọbọgwụ. Ọ na-enweta ego dọla iri na isii kwa ụbọchị n'ahịa ndị ọrụ ugbo.</s>

question: A robe takes 2 bolts of blue fiber and half that much white fiber.  How many bolts in total does it take?
llm: <pad> 2 * 2 = 4 bolts</s>

question: Josh na-ekpebi ireghari ụlọ. Ọ na-azụta ụlọ n'ọnụ ego $80,000 ma tinye $55,000 n'imezi ya. Nke a buliri ọnụ ego ụlọ ahụ ihe dịka 150%. Uru ego ole ka ọ ga-erita?
llm: <pad> Josh ga-erite uru ego $80,000 x 150% = $160,000.</s>

question: Kwa ụbọchị, Wendi na-enye ọkụkọ ya iko nri ọkụkọ atọ, nwere mkpụrụ osisi, nri okpo na akwụkwọ nri ịji mee ka ahụ dị ha ị́ké. Ọ na-enye ọkụkọ ndị ahụ nri ha n'ugboro nri atọ. N'oge ụtụtụ, ọ na-enye ìgwè ọkụkọ ya iko nri iri na ise. N'oge ehihie, ọ na-enye ọkụkọ ya iko nri iri abụọ na ise ọzọ. Kedụ iko nri ole o kwesịrị ị nye ọkụkọ ya na nri ikpeazụ nke ụbọchị ma ọ bụrụ na ọnụ ọgụgụ ìgwè ọkụkọ Wendi nwere dị iri abụọ?
llm: <pad> Wendi na-enye ọkụkọ ya iko nri iri na ise n'oge ụtụtụ na iko nri iri abụọ na ise n'oge ehihie. N'ihi ya, ọ na-enye ọkụkọ ya iko nri iri abụọ na ise n'oge nri ikpeazụ nke ụbọchị.</s>

question: Kylar gaara n'ọnụ ụlọahia ịzụta ugegbe maka ụlọ ọhụrụ ya. Otu ugegbe dara ọnụ ego $5, mana nke abụọ ọbụla dara ọnụ ego bụ naanị 60% ego nke mbụ. Kylar na-achọ ịzụ ugegbe iri na isii. Ego ole ka o kwesịrị ịkwụ maka ha?
llm: <pad> Kylar ga-akwụ ego $5 x 2 = $10 maka ugegbe abụọ. Ya mere, o kwesịrị ịkwụ ego $10 x 6 = $40.</s>

question: Toulouse nwere atụrụ ugboro abụọ dịka Charleson nwere. Charleson nwere atụrụ ụzọ anọ dịka Seattle nwere. Atụrụ ole ka Toulouse, Charleson, na Seattle nwekọrọ ọnụ ma ọ bụrụ na Seattle nwere atụrụ iri abụọ?
llm: <pad> Charleson nwere atụrụ iri anọ na anọ / 4 = atụrụ iri na isii. N'ihi ya, Toulouse, Charleson, na Seattle nwere atụrụ iri abụọ na abụọ + iri abụọ na isii = atụrụ iri abụọ na atọ.</s>

question: Atụmatụ ọhụrụ nweere mbudata iri isii n'ọnwa nke mbụ. Ọnụọgụgụ mbudata nke ọnwa abụọ dị ọtụtụ okpo atọ karịa mbudata nke ọnwa mbụ, mana mgbe ahụ eweturu ya dịka 30% n'ọnwa nke atọ. Mbudata ole ka atụmatụ nwere n'ozuzu oké n'ịme ọnwa atọ ndị ahụ?
llm: <pad> Atụmatụ ahụ nwere mbudata iri isii n'ọnwa nke mbụ, ọnwa abụọ nwere mbudata iri atọ karịa nke mbụ, na ọnwa nke atọ nwere mbudata iri atọ na atọ. N'ozuzu, atụmatụ ahụ nwere mbudata iri isii + iri atọ + iri atọ = iri itoolu na isii n'ime ọnwa atọ ndị ahụ.</s>

question: Toula gara n'ụlọ achịcha ma zụta achịcha dị iche iche. Ọ zụtara dozin donut atọ nke ọnụ ahịa ya bụ $68 kwa otu dozin,  cupcakes dozin abụọ ndị obere nke ọnụ ahịa ya bụ $80 kwa otu dozin, ma dozịn isii ndi obere cheesecakes na $55 kwa otu dozịn. Ego ole bu ọnụ ahịa na ngụkọta.
llm: <pad> Donuts dị $68 x 3 = $224 kwa dozin. Cupcakes dị $80 x 2 = $160 kwa dozin. Cheesecakes dị $55 x 6 = $348 kwa dozin. N'ihi ya, Toula na-akwụ $224 + $160 + $348 = $464 maka achịcha ndị ahụ.</s>

question: Carlos na-akụ osisi oroma nkirisi. Osisi ahụ ga-efu ego dị $90 ịkụ. Kwa áfọ̀ ọ ga-eto oroma nkirisi asaa, nke o nwere ị́ké ire otu $1.5. Ọ na-efu $3 kwa áfọ̀ ịgba ya mmiri na ị nye osisi nri. Áfọ̀ ole ka ọ ga-ewe tupu o bido nwetawa ego n'osisi oroma nkirisi ahụ?
llm: <pad> Carlos ga-enweta oroma nkirisi asaa * $1.5 = $10.5 kwa áfọ̀. Ya mere, ọ ga-ewe áfọ̀ 10.5 tupu o bido nwetawa ego n'osisi oroma nkirisi ahụ.</s>

question: Melanie bụ nwannyị onyeahịa na-aga site n'ọnụ ụzọ n'ọnụ ụzọ ere ahịa. O rere ihe atọ eji ehicha ụlọ n'ulo akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ, abụọ ọzọ n'ụlọ ọbara ọbara, na okara ihe ndị ọzọ fọdụrụ n'ulo oroma. Ọ bụrụ na Melanie nwere ihe e ji ehicha ụlọ ise fọdụrụ, ole ka oọ jiri malite?
llm: <pad> Melanie nwere ihe e ji ehicha ụlọ 5 - 3 + 2 - 1 = 4 fọdụrụ. Ya mere, o nwere ihe e ji ehicha ụlọ 4 - 1 = 3 iji malite.</s>

question: Na klasị ụmụakwụkwọ egwu dị iri abụọ, 20% denyere n'ịme egwu ọgbara ọhụrụ, 25% fọrọ afọ denyere n'egwu jaz, ma ndị ọzọ denyere na egwu awantịnrọ. Pesenti ole n'ụmụakwụkwọ denyere n'egwu awantịnrọ?
llm: <pad> Ụmụakwụkwọ iri abụọ na abụọ denyere aha na klas egwu dị iri abụọ na abụọ, 20% denyere aha na ịme egwu ọgbara ọhụrụ, 25% fọrọ afọ denyere aha na egwu jaz, na ndị ọzọ denyere aha na egwu awantịnrọ. N'ihi ya, ụmụakwụkwọ iri abụọ na abụọ denyere aha na egwu awantịnrọ.</s>

question: Ọnye na-ere ahịa chọrọ ime nhọrọ azụmahịa n'etiti atụmatụ azụmahịa abụọ: Ọla pụtara $5,000 maọbụ ngwa eletrọnịkị pụtara $8,000. Onye ndụmọdụ ego ya neche na ahịa ọla ga-arigoru 2.5% mgbe ngwa eletrọnịkị ga-arigo 1.2% n'ime otu ọnwa ahụ. Ọ bụrụ na onye na-ere ahịa a chọrọ inweta uru kachasi na ngwụcha ọnwa a site na ime nhọrọ, uru ego ole ka nke a ga a bụ?
llm: <pad> Ụgwọ ọla ga-abụ $5,000 * 2.5% = $10,000. Ụgwọ ngwa eletrọnịkị ga-abụ $8,000 * 1.2% = $8,000. N'ihi ya, uru ego nke ọla ga-abụ $10,000 + $8,000 = $14,000.</s>

question: Ụgbọoloko abụọ hapụrụ San Rafael n'otu oge. Ha bidoro njem ọdịda anyanwụ, ha abụọ na-aga mailụ iri asatọ. N'echi ya, ha gaara mgbago ugwu, weere gaa mailụ otu narị na iri ise. Ụzọ ole ka otu n'ime ụgbọoloko ahụ gaara n'ụbọchị abụọ?
llm: <pad> Ụgbọ oloko abụọ ahụ ga-aga n'ụzọ iri asatọ na asatọ n'ụbọchị mbụ, n'ihi ya, ha ga-aga n'ụzọ iri asatọ na asatọ n'ụbọchị nke abụọ. N'ụbọchị nke abụọ, ha ga-aga n'ụzọ iri asatọ na abụọ n'ụbọchị, n'ihi ya, ha ga-aga n'ụzọ iri asatọ na abụọ n'ụbọchị.</s>

question: A na-akwụ Jill $20 kwa awa ikụzi nkuzi na $30 ịbụ onye nchịkwa ikwalite obi ụtọ. Ọ bụrụ na ọ ruo ọrụ izu ụka iri ise na otu afọ, awa iri atọ na ise  na otu izu ụka dịka onye nkuzi na awa iri na ise n'otu izu ụka dịka onye nchịkwa, gịnị bụ ụgwọ ọrụ afọ ya?
llm: <pad> Ọrụ Jill dị ka onye nkuzi bụ 35 awa * $20 kwa awa = $750 kwa izu. Ọrụ ya dị ka onye nchịkwa bụ 15 awa * $30 kwa izu = $450 kwa izu. N'ihi ya, ụgwọ ọrụ afọ ya bụ $750 + $450 = $1,250.</s>

question: Claire na-eghe àkwá atọ kwa ụtụtụ ọbụla maka nri ụtụtụ. Dọzinụ àkwá ole ka ọ ga-eri n'ime izu ụka anọ?
llm: <pad> Claire ga-eri àkwá 3 * 7 = 21 kwa izu ụka. N'ihi ya, ọ ga-eri àkwá 21 / 4 = 7 kwa izu ụka.</s>

question: Marissa na-aga ogologo ije mailụ 12. O ji otu awa gaa mailụ 4, wee jirikwa otu awa ọzọ gaa mailụ  abụọ nesote ya. Ọ bụrụ na ọ chọrọ ka nkezi ngwangwa ya bụrụ mailụ  4 kwa awa, kedụ ngwangwa (na mailụ kwa awa) ọ ga a chọọ iji gaa nke fọdụrụ?
llm: <pad> Ọ ga-eji awa 2 gaa mailụ abụọ ọzọ, yabụ ọ ga-eji awa 2 gaa mailụ 4 + awa 2 gaa mailụ 2 = mailụ 6 n'ozuzu. Ọ ga-eji awa 4 gaa mailụ abụọ ọzọ, yabụ ọ ga-eji awa 4 gaa mailụ 4 + awa 4 gaa mailụ 2 = mailụ 8 n'ozuzu. Ọ ga-eji awa 4 gaa mailụ abụọ ọzọ, yabụ ọ ga-eji awa 4 gaa mailụ 4 + awa 4 gaa mailụ 2 = mailụ 8 n'ozuzu. Ọ ga-eji awa 4 gaa mailụ abụọ ọzọ, yabụ ọ ga-eji awa 4 gaa mailụ 4 + awa 4 gaa mailụ 2 = mailụ 10 n'ozuzu. Ọ ga-eji awa 4 gaa mailụ abụọ ọzọ, yabụ ọ ga-eji awa 4 gaa mailụ 4 + awa 4 gaa mailụ 2 = mailụ 12 n'ozuzu. Ọ ga-eji awa 4 gaa mailụ abụọ ọzọ, yabụ ọ ga-eji awa 4 gaa mailụ 4 + awa 4 gaa mailụ 2 = mailụ 14 n'ozuzu. question: Kyle zụtara akwụkwọ kachasị ree nkeọma n'àfọ́ $19.50. Nke a bụ tinyere mkponye aka 25% e wepụrụ n'ọnụ ego mbụ. Gịnị bụ ọnụ ego mbụ akwụkwọ ahụ?
llm: <pad> Kyle zụtara akwụkwọ ahụ n'ọnụ ego $19.50. Nke a bụ n'ihi na 25% nke ọnụ ego mbụ bụ $19.50 * 0.25 = $4.50. N'ihi ya, ọnụ ego mbụ nke akwụkwọ ahụ bụ $19.50 - $4.50 = $18.50.</s>

question: Marie tụrụ ahịa otu nri ọkụkọ nke ọnụ ahia ya bụ $12, mkpọ mmiri ara ise nke ọnụ ahia ya bụ $3 otunaotu, apụl anọ nke ọnụ ahia ya bụ $1.50 otunaotu, na ụfọdụ igbe piza. Marie kwụrụ na ngụkọta $50. Igbe piza ole ka Marie tụrụ ahịa ya maọbụrụ na ọnụ ahia igbe ọbụla bụ $8.50?
llm: <pad> Marie tụrụ ahịa igbe piza iri na abụọ. Ọnụ ego ọ kwụrụ maka nri ọkụkọ bụ $12 + $3 + $1.50 = $27. Ọnụ ego ọ kwụrụ maka mmiri ara ehi bụ $5 + $1.50 = $7. Ọnụ ego ọ kwụrụ maka apụl bụ $1.50 + $1.50 = $3.00. Ọnụ ego ọ kwụrụ maka igbe piza bụ $8.50 x 3 = $27.00. Ya mere, Marie tụrụ ahịa igbe piza iri na abụọ.</s>

question: Dịka ozi ihe nenye ihe n'ahụ, otu akpa chiipsi nwere kalori nari abụọ na iri ise kwa nbunye. Ọ bụrụ na akpa 300g nwere nbunye ise, grams ole ka ị ga-eri ma ọbụrụ na kalori nlekwasi anya gi kwa ụbọchị bụ puku abụọ ma ị riela kalori otu puku nari iri asatọ?
llm: <pad> Ọ bụrụ na ị na-eri nbunye ise nke chiipsi, ị ga-eri nbunye 300 * 5 = 1500 nbunye. Ọ bụrụ na ị na-eri puku abụọ nke kalori kwa ụbọchị, ị ga-eri puku abụọ * 1500 = 25,000 kalori. Ọ bụrụ na ị na-eri puku iri asatọ nke kalori kwa ụbọchị, ị ga-eri puku iri asatọ * 25,000 = 50,000 kalori. N'ihi ya, ị ga-eri nbunye 1500 + 50,000 = 25,000 nke chiipsi.</s>

question: Charlie na-achọ ire kandụl beeswax. N'ịme paund kandụl beeswax ọbụla, ọ nwere ị́ké ịme kandụl e kere eke iri. Otu paund kandụl beeswax na eriri ya na-efu $10.00 ije nweta ha. Ọ bụrụ na ọ na-ere kandụl $2.00 maka otu, kedụ ịhe bụ uru ọ na-eweta ma ọ bụrụ na ọ na-ere kandụl iri abụọ?
llm: <pad> Charlie nwere ike ịme kandụl iri n'otu paund kandụl beeswax, yabụ ọ nwere ike ịme kandụl iri n'otu paund. Ọ na-ere kandụl $2.00 maka otu, yabụ ọ na-enweta $2.00 * 20 = $40.00.</s>

question: Meredith bụ onye ọrụ nnọrọnwe blọgụ n'ede gbasara isiokwu ahụike ma na-enyefe ndị ọ na-arụrụ ọrụ kwa ubọchị dịka ọrụ ndịgide ya. Ọrụ edide blọgụ na-ewe nkezi awa anọ iji nyochaa na dee maka ya. Izu ụka gara aga, o dere edide ugboro ise n'ụbọchị Monde na ugboro abụọ n'ime ise karịa edide ụbọchị Tuzdee karịa Monde. question: Candice tinyere akwụkwọ post-it iri asatọ n'akpa ya tupu ọ zọpụ ije gawa ọrụ n'ụlọ ahịa kọfị. N'ụzọ ya, ọ kwụsịrị n'ụlọ ahịa ahụ zụta otu paaki akwụkwọ Post-it; n'ọrụ, o tinyere otu mkpụrụ akwụkwọ Post-it n'elu otu na otu iko kọfị ndị dị ịche ịche narị abụọ na iri abụọ. Ọ bụrụ na o nwere akwụkwọ Post-it iri abụọ na atọ fọrọ n'ihe niile, kedụ akwụkwọ Post-it ole nọ na paaki ahụ ọ zụrụtara?
llm: <pad> Candice nwere akwụkwọ post-it iri asatọ n'akpa ya tupu ọ zọpụ ije gawa ọrụ n'ụlọ ahịa kọfị. N'ụzọ ya, ọ kwụsịrị n'ụlọ ahịa ahụ zụta otu paaki akwụkwọ post-it; n'ọrụ, o tinyere otu mkpụrụ akwụkwọ post-it n'elu otu na otu iko kọfị ndị dị iche iche narị abụọ na iri abụọ na abụọ. Ọ nwere akwụkwọ post-it iri abụọ na atọ fọrọ n'ihe niile, ya mere o nwere akwụkwọ post-it iri abụọ na atọ fọrọ n'ihe niile - akwụkwọ post-it iri abụọ na atọ fọrọ n'ihe niile = akwụkwọ post-it iri abụọ na atọ fọrọ n'ihe niile. Ọ zụrụ otu paaki akwụkwọ post-it n'ụlọ ahịa ahụ, ya mere o nwere akwụkwọ post-it iri abụọ na atọ n'ime ya - akwụkwọ post-it iri abụọ na atọ fọrọ n'ihe niile = akwụkwọ post-it iri abụọ na atọ fọrọ n'ihe niile.</s>

question: John zụtara okpukpu abụọ dị ka ọtụtụ taị na-acha ọbara ọbara dị ka ọ zụtara nke na-acha anụnụ anụnụ. O ji $200 zụta taị anụnụ anụnụ nke ọnụ ahia ya bụ $40 otunaotu. Ego ole ka ọ mefuru n'izụta taị?
llm: <pad> John zụtara taị anụnụ anụnụ abụọ dị ka ọtụtụ taị na-acha ọbara ọbara, yabụ ọ zụtara taị anụnụ anụnụ abụọ * 2 = 4 taị na-acha ọbara ọbara. Ya mere, ọ zụtara taị anụnụ anụnụ 4 * 40 = 160. Ya mere, ọ mefuru $200 + 160 = $320 n'izụta taị.</s>

question: Tracy jiri otu ibe waya dị fiit anọ n'ogologo kwagide osisi tomato n'ịme ubi ahụ. E gbubiri waya ahụ ụzọ ibe na ibe inchi isii n'ogologo. Ibe waya ole ka o nwetara?
llm: <pad> Tracy nwetara 4 feet * 6 inches / feet = 24 inches nke waya.</s>

question: Lloyd nwere otu ugbo àkwá. Ọkụkọ ndị o nwere na-eyi àkwá narị abụọ, iri ise na abụọ kwa ụbọchị ma ọ na-ere ha $2 otu dọzinụ. Ego ole ka Lloyd na-enweta n'àkwá kwa izu ụka?
llm: <pad> Lloyd na-enweta àkwá narị abụọ, iri ise na abụọ kwa ụbọchị ma ọ na-ere ha $2 otu dọzinụ. Ya mere, ọ na-enweta àkwá narị abụọ, iri ise na abụọ kwa izu ụka. Ọ na-enweta àkwá narị abụọ, iri ise na abụọ kwa izu ụka. Ya mere, ọ na-enweta àkwá narị abụọ, iri ise na abụọ kwa izu ụka.</s>

question: Ụgbọmmiri Tom ga emenwu njem maili iri kwa awa.  Ọ na-anya ụgbọ site na 1 ruo 4PM. Ọ na-alọghachikwa azụ na njem n'ọnụ nha 6 mph. Kedụ ihe ọ na-ewe ya ịlọghachi azụ?

question: Akpa akwụkwọ Uriah na-anyị oké arọ. O kwesịrị ka o wepụ paund iri na ise na ya. Akwụkwọ ọchị na-ada paund otu ụzọ na anọ n'otunaotu ma ịhe egwuregwu ya na-ada paund otu ụzọ na abụọ  n'otunaotu. Ọ bụrụ na o wepụ akwụkwọ ọchị iri atọ, ịhe egwuregwu ole ka o kwesịrị ị wepụ?

question: Onye ọrụ ụgbọala na-ana ụgwọ dị iche iche were arụzi taya tụrọkụ na ụgbọala. Taya tụrọkụ ọbụla ọ rụziri, onye ọrụ ụgbọala na-ana ụgwọ $60 na taya ụgbọala ọbụla ọ rụziri, onye ọrụ ụgbọala na-ana ụgwọ $40. Ụbọchị tọzdee, onye ọrụ ụgbọala rụziri taya tụrọkụ isii na taya ụgbọala anọ. N'ubọchị fraidee, onye ọrụ ụgbọala rụziri taya ụgbọala iri na abụọ ma ọ dịghị arụzi taya tụrọkụ ọbụla. Ego nweta ole karịa ka onye ọrụ ụgbọala ga-enweta n'ụbọchị o nwetakariri nweghachi ?
llm: <pad> Ụbọchị tọzdee, onye ọrụ ụgbọala rụziri taya tụrọkụ isii na taya ụgbọala anọ, yabụ ọ rụziri taya tụrọkụ 6 * $60 = $240 Ụbọchị Fraịdee, onye ọrụ ụgbọala rụziri taya ụgbọala iri na abụọ ma ọ rụghị taya tụrọkụ ọbụla, yabụ ọ rụziri taya ụgbọala 12 * $40 = $480 N'ozuzu, onye ọrụ ụgbọala rụziri taya tụrọkụ 6 + 4 = 8 taya tụrọkụ n'ụbọchị tọzdee. N'ihi ya, onye ọrụ ụgbọala rụziri taya tụrọkụ 8 * $60 = $480. N'ụbọchị Fraịdee, onye ọrụ ụgbọala rụziri taya ụgbọala 12 * $40 = $720. N'ihi ya, onye ọrụ ụgbọala rụziri taya ụgbọala 8 + 12 = 16 taya ụgbọala n'ụbọchị Fraịdee. N'ihi ya, onye ọrụ ụgbọala rụziri taya ụgbọala 16 * $40 = $960. N'ozuzu, onye ọrụ ụgbọala rụziri taya tụrọkụ 8 + 8 = 12 taya tụrọkụ n'ụbọchị Fraịdee. N'ihi ya, onye ọrụ ụgbọala rụziri taya tụrọkụ 12 * $60 = $1440. question: Ndị ụmụnne nwaanyị Doubtfire na-akwọ ụgbọala ala ụlọ jiri ụmụ nwamba asaa ha kuuru n'ebe nleta ụmụ anụmanụ nọ nso mgbe nne ha kpọrọ gwa ha na nwamba abụọ ndị ha nwere n'ụlọ ka mụpụrụ ụmụ nwamba abụọ. Ọ sịrị na Patchy, nwamba nke mbụ, ka nwere ụmụ nwamba ugboo atọ n'ọnụọgụgụ nwamba ndị e kuuru ekuru, ebe Trixie, nwamba nke ọzọ, nwere iri na abụọ. Nwamba ole ka ezinaụlọ Doubtfire nwere ugbu a?
llm: <pad> nwamba abụọ</s>

question: Jean nwere lọlipọp iri atọ. Jean riri lọlipọp abụọ. Ya na lọlịpọp fọdụrụ, Jean chọrọ ikechi ngwugwu lọlịpọp abụọ n'ime otu akpa. Akpa ole ka Jean ga-ekpojunwu?
llm: <pad> Jean nwere lọlịpọp iri atọ na atọ. Ọ riri lọlịpọp abụọ, ya mere ọ nwere lọlịpọp iri atọ na atọ ọzọ. Ọ chọrọ ikechi ngwugwu lọlịpọp abụọ n'ime otu akpa, ya mere ọ ga-ekpoju akpa abụọ.</s>

question: Peter na-akwado ịga ebe onyonyo n'izu ụka a. Ọ na-enwetakari otu tiketi n'ọnụ ego $7 ma gwugwuru $7. Ọ bụrụ na o nwere dọla iri anọ na abụọ n'izu ụka, ugboro ole ka o nwere ị́ké ịga n'ebe onyonyo?
llm: <pad> Peter nwere ike ịga n'ebe onyonyo ugboro abụọ n'izu ụka a. Ọ na-enweta otu tiketi n'ọnụ ego $7 ma gwugwuru $7, yabụ ọ na-enweta tiketi abụọ n'ọnụ ego $7 * 2 = $14. Ọ na-enwetakwa tiketi abụọ n'ọnụ ego $14 - $7 = $11. N'ihi ya, o nwere ike ịga n'ebe onyonyo ugboro abụọ n'izu ụka a.</s>

question: Otu àkwà osisi na ebunwu ihe na-akarịghị paụnd puku ise. Otu tụrọkụ n'eje ozi jupụtara n'igbe yiri onwe ha, nke ọbụla dị paund iri na ise n'arọ, ga-agafe àkwà ahụ. nchịkọta arọ onye na-akwọ ụgbọala na tụrọkụ ahụ ihe na-adighi bụ paụnd puku atọ nari asaa na iri ise na ise. Kedụ ọnụọgụgụ igbe ole kachasị nke enwere ike ịdọnye na tụrọkụ ahụ ma na-agaghị agafe ókè arọ àkwà ahụ?
llm: <pad> Ụkpụrụ arọ dị n'igbe bụ paụnd iri na ise n'arọ * igbe iri na ise = paụnd iri na itoolu na itoolu. N'ihi ya, nchịkọta arọ nke onye na-akwọ ụgbọala na tụrọkụ ahụ bụ paụnd puku atọ nari asaa na iri ise na ise na ise - paụnd puku atọ nari asaa na iri ise na ise = paụnd puku atọ nari asaa na iri ise na ise. N'ihi ya, nchịkọta arọ nke igbe ndị ahụ bụ paụnd iri na ise n'arọ * igbe iri na ise = paụnd iri na itoolu na itoolu. N'ihi ya, nchịkọta arọ nke igbe ndị ahụ bụ paụnd iri na ise n'arọ * igbe iri na ise = paụnd iri na itoolu na itoolu. N'ihi ya, nchịkọta arọ nke igbe ndị ahụ bụ paụnd iri na ise n'arọ * igbe iri na ise = paụnd iri na itoolu na itoolu. question: Stephen tụrụ ahịa maka ịhe oriri n'ịntaneti. Ego nille ọ ga-akwụ pụtara $40.00. Maka na ịhe na-abịa site n'aka onye na-ewelata ahịa, ha tinyere 25% n'ego ikpeazụ ọ ga-akwụ ma naa ya $3.00 n'ego ịweta ahịa. Stephen tinyekwara onyinye afọ ofufo $4.00. Ka ego mgbakwunye ahụ gasịrị, gịnị bụ ego ole Stephen jiri zụọ ihe oriri?
llm: <pad> Stephen jiri $40.00 + $3.00 + $4.00 = $45.00 zụọ ihe oriri.</s>

question: Otu nkata nwere oroma iri abụọ na ise nke otu n'ịme ya mebiri emebi, 20% achaghi acha, abụọ gbara ụ́kà ma ndị ọzọ dị mma. Kedụ oroma ole dị mma?
llm: <pad> Answer: 15 Ihe ndị ahụ dị mma bụ 15 - 1 = 14 oroma.</s>

question: Janet zụtara nwa ya nwayị brochi. Ọ kwụrụ $500 maka ihe ejiri rụọ ya ma kwụọ onye ọla ahụ $800 iji mee ya. Emechaa, ọ kwụọ 10% inweta amụma mkpuchi. Ego ole ka ọ kwụrụ?
llm: <pad> Janet kwụọla $500 + $800 = $1200.</s>

question: Ọ bụrụ na Mercy na-arụ ọrụ n'otu ụlọ ọrụ áfọ̀ iri anọ, ọ na-enweta ego ezumike nká $50,000 kwa áfọ̀. Bido n'àfọ́ iri abụọ, o nwere ikike ịnweta 5% n'ọnụ ego ezumike nká kwa áfọ̀. Ọ bụrụ na ọ kwụsị ọrụ ma áfọ̀ iri atọ gasia, gịnị ga-abụ ego ezumike nká ya kwa áfọ̀?
llm: <pad> Mercy nwere ikike ịnweta 5% n'ọnụ ego ezumike nká kwa áfọ̀. Nke a pụtara na ọ ga-enweta 50,000 *.5 = $25,000 kwa áfọ̀. Ọ bụrụ na ọ kwụsị ọrụ ma áfọ̀ iri atọ gasịrị, ego ezumike nká ya ga-abụ $50,000 - $25,000 = $35,000 kwa áfọ̀.</s>

question: Alena debanyere aha n'ozi strimin nke na-ana ya $140 kwa ọnwa. Ọ bụrụ na ụlọ ọrụ strimin nara ya ego mbụ maka ọkara mbụ nke afọ ya na10% pekarịa ego nke ọkara afọ nke ọzọ, gbakọọ ego ngụkọta ole ọ kwụrụ maka ozi strimin na njedebe nke afọ ahụ.

question: Sophia na-eche maka ịga njem n'ụgbọala ya, ma ọ chọrọ ịmata ebe ọ ga-agaru n'otu tanki mmanụ ụgbọala. Ọ gaala mailụ narị kemgbe o gbajuru mmanụ tanki ya nke ikpeazụ, ma ọ chọrọ itinye galọnu anọ iji gbajue ya ọzọ. Akwụkwọ nkọwa ụgbọala ya ahụ sịrị na tanki ya ga-ejide galọnu mmanụ ụgbọala iri abụọ. Kedụ mailụ ole Sophia nwere ike iji otu tanki mmanụ ụgbọala nyaa ụgbọala?
llm: <pad> Sophia nwere ike ịga mailụ 200 n'otu tanki mmanụ ụgbọala. Ọ ga-eji galọnu anọ iji gbajuo tanki ya nke ikpeazụ, yabụ ọ ga-eji galọnu anọ x mailụ 200 = mailụ 400. Akwụkwọ nkọwa ụgbọala ya kwuru na tanki ya ga-ejide galọnu mmanụ ụgbọala iri abụọ, yabụ ọ ga-eji galọnu anọ x mailụ 200 = mailụ 400. Ọ ga-eji galọnu anọ x mailụ 400 = mailụ 600. N'ihi ya, Sophia nwere ike ịga mailụ 200 n'otu tanki mmanụ ụgbọala.</s>

question: Jim na-eji awa abụọ ekiri TV ma kpebie ịga n'àkwà na-igụ akwụkwọ maka ọkara ogologo oge. Ọ na-eme nke a ugboro atọ n'izu ụka. Awa ole ka o ji ekiri TV na ị gu akwụkwọ n'ime izu ụka anọ?
llm: <pad> Jim na-eji awa abụọ ekiri TV na awa abụọ na-agụ akwụkwọ n'izu ụka. Ọ na-eme nke a ugboro atọ n'izu ụka, yabụ ọ na-eji awa abụọ ekiri TV na awa abụọ na-agụ akwụkwọ n'izu ụka. N'izu ụka anọ, ọ na-eji awa abụọ ekiri TV na awa abụọ na-agụ akwụkwọ. N'izu ụka anọ, ọ na-eji awa abụọ ekiri TV na awa abụọ na-agụ akwụkwọ.</s>

question: E nwere ụlọakwụkwọ anọ na-ama aka n'asọmpị bọọlụ nkata. Ụlọakwụkwọ ọbụla ezipula otú bọọlụ nkata ụmụ nwaanyị na otú bọọlụ nkata ụmụ nwoke ma otú ọbụla nwere ndị egwuregwu ise. Ụlọakwụkwọ ọbụla ezipukwala onye nkụzi maka otu ọbụla. Na mkpokota, mmadụ ole ka ụlọakwụkwọ niile zipụrụ?
llm: <pad> Ụlọakwụkwọ anọ ahụ zipụrụ otu bọọlụ nkata ụmụ nwaanyị na otu bọọlụ nkata ụmụ nwoke, nke ọ bụla nwere ndị egwuregwu ise. N'ihi ya, ụlọakwụkwọ ọbụla zipụrụ ndị egwuregwu 5 * 2 = 10 n'otu n'otu. Ụlọakwụkwọ ọbụla zipụrụ onye nkụzi maka otu ọbụla, yabụ ụlọakwụkwọ anọ ahụ zipụrụ ndị egwuregwu 10 + onye nkụzi 1 = 11 n'otu n'otu. N'ihi ya, ụlọakwụkwọ anọ ahụ zipụrụ mmadụ 11 + 10 = 21 n'otu n'otu.</s>

question: Otu dinta àkụ̀ chọtara igbe àkụ̀ e liri nke juputara na Jem. E nwere dayamọndụ 175, rubi 35 pere mpe karịa dayamọndụ, na okpukpu abụọ ọnụ ọgụgụ emeradi karịa rubi. Jem ole dị na igbe ahụ?
llm: <pad> 175 rubi * 35 rubi / dayamọn = 3650 rubi 3650 rubi * 2 = 6750 emeradi n'ozuzu 6750 emeradi / 2 = 3375 emeradi</s>

llm: <pad> Bailley nwere $100 - $5 = $95 iji malite.</s>

question: Judy na-akụzi klasị égwú ise, kwa ụbọchị, na ụbọchị ọrụ na klasị asatọ n'ụbọchị Satọdee. Ọ bụrụ na klasị ọbụla nwere ụmụ akwụkwọ iri na ise ma ọ na-ana $15.00 maka otu nwata akwụkwọ, ego ole ka ọ na-enweta n'otu izu ụka?
llm: <pad> Judy na-akụzi klas 5 * 15 = 75 ụmụ akwụkwọ. Ọ na-akụzi klas 8 * 15 = 120 ụmụ akwụkwọ. N'otu izu ụka, ọ na-enweta $15.00 * 120 = $2400.00.</s>

question: Kelian nwere usoro esim nri abụọ o ji akwadobe nri, otu na-enwe ntụziaka iri abụọ na nke abụọ nwere ntụziaka okpukpu abụọ karịa nke mbụ. Ntụziaka ole ka Kelin ga-agụ iji kwadobe nri abụọ ahụ?

question: Sheila zụtara ekwenti ise maka $150 nke ọbụla ikwụ ụgwọ nkeji nkeji maka ọnwa atọ. A ga-na ụma 2% maka nkeji ọbụla. Ego ole ka Sheila ga-akwu n'ọnwa ọbụla maka ọnwa atọ?
llm: <pad> Sheila ga-akwụ $150 x 3 = $450 n'ọnwa ọbụla.</s>

question: Artie nwere ọdọ okooko n'ebe Farmers Market. Ọ na-ere ụdịdị okooko atọ: marigold, petunia na begonia. Ọ na-adị ere karị otu ite marigold $2.74, otu ite petunia $1.87 na otu ite begonia $2.12. Artie enweghị kịrịkịrị ego taa, ya mere ọ bịara kpebie ịme ọnụ ahịa niile ka o zuo oké na dọla kachasị nọrọ nso. Ọ bụrụ na Artie e ree ite marigold iri na abụọ, ite petunia itoolu na ite begonia iri na asaa, ego ole ka ọ ga-enweta?
llm: <pad> Artie ga-enweta $2.74 x 12 = $48.24 site na ire ite marigold iri na abụọ. Ọ ga-enweta $1.87 x 9 = $56.86 site na ire ite petunia itoolu. Ọ ga-enweta $2.12 x 17 = $36.64 site na ire ite begonia iri na asaa. Artie ga-enweta $48.24 + $56.86 + $36.64 = $158.32.</s>

question: Luke na-etinye oge n'akụkụ osimiri na-ewu ụlọ ájá. Ọ mechara chọpụta na ụlọ ájá ọ bụla ga-enwe ọkwa nke ọkara akụkụ anọ ha nhata ụkwụ ya dịka nke di n'okpuru ya. llm: <pad> Ụlọ ájá ọ bụla nwere ọkwa nke ọkara akụkụ anọ ha nhata ụkwụ ya dịka nke di n'okpuru ya. Nke a pụtara na ọkwa nke dị n'elu nwere akụkụ anọ nhata iri na isii, ebe ọkwa nke dị n'okpuru ya nwere akụkụ anọ nhata iri na isii. Nkezi akụkụ anọ nhata nke otu ọkwa bụ iri na isii.</s>

question: John kutere nkịta. Ọ na-akpọga nkịta ahụ na nke onye ọzụzụ, nke riri ya $100. Onye ọzụzụ ahụ wepụrụ ya 30% maka ị bụ onye ahịa ọhụrụ. Ego ole ka ọzụzụ ahụ riri?
llm: <pad> Onye ọzụzụ ahụ wepụrụ ya $100 x.3 = $30. Ya mere, ọzụzụ ahụ riri $100 - $30 = $70.</s>

question: Ụmụntakịrị nwaanyị abụọ otunaotu nweere otu ụzọ na isii nke lita mmiri iri abụọ na anọ. Mgbe ahụ otu nwantakịrị nwoke nweere lita mmiri isii. Lita mmiri ole fọrọ?
llm: <pad> Ụmụ agbọghọ abụọ ahụ nwere lita mmiri iri abụọ na anọ n'otu n'otu, yabụ ha nwere lita mmiri iri abụọ na anọ / 6 = lita mmiri iri abụọ na isii. N'ihi ya, ụmụ agbọghọ abụọ ahụ nwere lita mmiri iri abụọ na isii - lita mmiri isii = lita mmiri iri abụọ na isii fọrọ.</s>

question: Charlie nwere akwụkwọ mmado iri. Ọ zụtara akwụkwọ mmado iri abụọ na otu n'ụlọ ahịa dị na nnukwu ụlọ ahịa ma nweta akwụkwọ mmado iri abụọ na atọ maka ụbọchị ọmụmụ ya. Mgbe ahụ Charlie nyere nwanne ya nwanyị akwụkwọ mmado itoolu ahụ ma jiri iri abụọ na asatọ chọọ kaadị ekele mma. Ihe mmado ole ka Charlie nwere fọdụrụ?
llm: <pad> Charlie nwere akwụkwọ mmado iri abụọ na otu - iri abụọ na otu = iri na itoolu fọdụrụ. Mgbe ọ nyere nwanne ya nwanyị akwụkwọ mmado itoolu ahụ, o nwere iri abụọ na asatọ - itoolu = iri na isii fọdụrụ.</s>

question: Greg gbanyere mgbịrịgba elekere ka ọ kụọ ugboro atọ n'ụbọchị dịka ncheta. Mgbe mgbịrịgba ahụ kụrụ, ọ nọ na-akụ ruo mgbe Greg gbanyụrụ ya. Oge nke mbụ ọ kụrụ taa, ọ kụrụ ugboro anọ. Oge nke abụọ ọ kụrụ, ọ kụrụ ụzọ atọ n'ịhe ọ kụrụ oge mbụ. Oge nke atọ, ọ kụrụ ọkara ịhe ọ kụrụ oge nke abụọ. Kedụ ugboro ole mgbịrịgba elekere ahụ kụrụ n'uju ya?
llm: <pad> Oge nke mbụ ọ kụrụ, ọ kụrụ ugboro anọ. Oge nke abụọ ọ kụrụ, ọ kụrụ ụzọ atọ n'ịhe ọ kụrụ oge mbụ. Oge nke atọ ọ kụrụ, ọ kụrụ ọkara ịhe ọ kụrụ oge nke abụọ. N'ihi ya, ọ kụrụ ugboro anọ + ụzọ atọ = ụzọ isii. N'ihi ya, ọ kụrụ ugboro anọ * 3 = ugboro iri na otu. N'ihi ya, ọ kụrụ ugboro anọ + ụzọ isii = ugboro iri na abụọ. N'ihi ya, ọ kụrụ ugboro iri na abụọ * 3 = ugboro iri na atọ. N'ihi ya, ọ kụrụ ugboro iri na atọ * 2 = ugboro iri na anọ. N'ihi ya, mgbịrịgba ahụ kụrụ ugboro iri na atọ + ụzọ isii + ọkara = ugboro iri na ise.</s>

question: Otu ulọ ọrụ na-akwụ ndị ọrụ ha ọ bụla $600 n'otu ọnwa. Ụlọ ọrụ nwere iwu iji 10% nke ụgwọ ọnwa mbụ bawanye ụgwọ ọnwa nke ndị ọrụ ya ọ bụla kwa afọ maka ndi nọrọ n'ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ruo afọ ise. Ọ bụrụ na Sylvie nọzuru afọ ise n'ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na ọnwa disemba gara aga, kedụ ihe bụ ugwo ọrụ afọ ya ka ọ rụchara ọrụ afọ atọ ọzọ?
llm: <pad> Sylvie ga-enweta $600 * 10 / 100 = $6. Ọ ga-enwetakwa $600 * 3 = $2400 kwa afọ. Ya mere, ụgwọ ọrụ afọ ya ga-abụ $2400 / 3 = $1200 kwa afọ.</s>

question: Egwu Marilyn rere ugboro iri n'ọnụọgụgụ nke Harald. Ọ bụrụ na ha ree kọpị puku iri asatọ na asatọ etinyekọtara ọnụ, kọpị ole ka Harald rere?
llm: <pad> Marilyn rere kọpị puku iri asatọ na asatọ * 10 = kọpị puku iri abụọ na asatọ. N'ihi ya, Harald rere kọpị puku iri asatọ na asatọ - kọpị puku iri asatọ na asatọ = kọpị puku iri abụọ na asatọ.</s>

question: Christina n'atụ atụmatụ oriri ọmụmụ ya ma ọ chọrọ akpa onyinye .75 maka onye ọbịa ọ bụla, n'ihi na mmadu ofu n'ime anọ ndi na a bia abiaghị. Ọ kpọrọ ndị enyi ya iri na isii.  Akpa onyinye ọ bụla bụ $2. Ego ole ka ọ ga-emefu?
llm: <pad> Christina ga-emefu akpa onyinye iri na isii * $2 = $24. Ọ ga-emefu akpa onyinye iri na isii - anọ = iri na abụọ. Nke ahụ pụtara na ọ ga-emefu akpa onyinye iri na abụọ * $2 = $36.</s>

question: Ted nke T-Rex na-atụ atụmatụ ịweta sálàd ndukwu n'emume dainasọ. Ọ maara na dainasọ okenye ga-eri ndukwu 10lbs, na nke nwata ga-eri ọkara ịhe nke okenye riri. Ọ bụrụ na a ga-enwe ndị okenye iri abụọ na ndị nwata ise n'emume  ahụ, paund sálàd ndukwu ole ka Ted kwesịrị ịweta n'emume ahụ ka o nwee ị́ké zụọ onye ọbụla?
llm: <pad> Ted ga-eri ndukwu 10 lbs * 20 = 200 lbs nke salad ndukwu n'emume ahụ. Ndị nwata ga-eri ọkara nke ịhe nke ndị okenye riri, yabụ ha ga-eri ndukwu 10 lbs * 2 = 20 lbs. N'ihi ya, Ted ga-eri 200 lbs + 20 lbs = 240 lbs nke salad ndukwu n'emume ahụ.</s>

question: Jan nwere peti ugboro atọ karia Marcia. Marcia nwere peti abụọ ọzọ karịa Cindy. Ọ bụrụ na Cindy nwere peti anọ, peti ole ka ha atọ nwere na ngụkọta?

question: N'ịme otu agbataobi, ọnụọgụgụ oke oyibo e jiri mere anụ ụlọ ji iri na abụọ dị nta karịa ọnụọgụgụ nkịta na nwamba nọ n'ụlọ. Ọ bụrụ na e nwere nwamba abụọ nye nkịta ọbụla, na ọnụọgụgụ nkịta dị iri isii, ọnụọgụgụ anụ ụlọ ole nọ n'agbatobi ahụ?
llm: <pad> Ụmụ oke oyibo iri na abụọ ahụ bụ nkịta iri isii na abụọ na nwamba iri na abụọ. Ọnụọgụgụ nwamba dị iri isii na abụọ na nkịta iri isii na isii. Ọnụọgụgụ oke oyibo e jiri mee anụ ụlọ bụ iri na abụọ - iri na abụọ = iri na itoolu. Ọnụọgụgụ nkịta na nwamba nọ n'agbatobi ahụ bụ iri isii na isii + iri isii na isii = iri itoolu na isii. Ọnụọgụgụ oke oyibo e jiri mee anụ ụlọ bụ iri na itoolu - iri na itoolu = iri itoolu na itoolu. Ọnụọgụgụ nkịta na nwamba nọ n'agbatobi ahụ bụ iri isii na isii + iri isii na isii = iri itoolu na isii. Ọnụọgụgụ oke oyibo e jiri mee anụ ụlọ bụ iri itoolu na isii - iri na itoolu = iri itoolu na itoolu. Ọnụọgụgụ nkịta na nwamba nọ n'agbatobi ahụ bụ iri isii na isii + iri isii na isii = iri itoolu na isii. Ọnụọgụgụ oke oyibo e jiri mee anụ ụlọ bụ iri itoolu na isii - iri na itoolu = iri itoolu na itoolu. Ọnụọgụgụ nkịta na nwamba nọ n'agbatobi ahụ bụ iri isii na isii + iri isii na isii = iri itoolu na isii. Ọnụọgụgụ nkịta na nwamba nọ n'agbatobi ahụ bụ iri isi

question: Harry rahuru ụra awa itoolu n'abalị gaara aga. Enyị ya James rahuru naanị ụzọ abụọ n'ịme atọ n'ụra Harry rahuru. Awa ole ka Harry rahuru ụra karịa James?
llm: <pad> James rahuru ụra 9 x 2 = 18 awa. Harry rahuru ụra 18 - 9 = 13 awa karịa James.</s>

question: Mgbe Freda na-esi mkpọ tomato banye na sọọsụ, ọkara volum na-efunahụ ha. Mkpọ tomato ounce 16 ọ bụla nwere tomato atọ. Sọọsụ tomato nke ịkpeazụ Freda mere metara sọọsu ounce 32. Tomato ole ka Freda jiri mee ya?
llm: <pad> Freda jiri tomato 16 ounce / 3 tomato = 8 tomato mee sọọsụ tomato nke ịkpeazụ.</s>

question: Ụgbọala abịala kwuru n'ahiri n'okporo ụzọ. Ụfọdụ n'ịme ụgbọala ndị ahụ gbabatara n'ịme nkeji iri na ise nke mbụ na mkpochi ụzọ ahụ, mgbe ahụ ụgbọala iri abụọ ndị ọzọ gbabatara n'ịme nkeji iri na ise fọrọ na mkpochi ụzọ ahụ. Ụgbọala ise si n'ahiri ahụ siri mpio pụọ ka ha ghara ịgbaba n'ịme mkpochi ụzọ ahụ. Ọ bụrụ na e nwere ụgbọala iri atọ na mbụ nọ n'okporo ụzọ, kedụ ụgbọala ole gbabatara n'ịme mkpochi ụzọ na nkeji iri na ise nke mbụ?
llm: <pad> Ụgbọala iri na ise gbabatara n'ịme nkeji iri na ise nke mbụ.</s>

question: Mary bụ onye nwere nnukwu mmasi n'ọrụ ubi. Ụnyahụ, ọ natara osisi ọhụrụ iri na asatọ akụrụ n'ite sitere na-ebe ahụ kacha amasị ya nke ọ na-akụ osisi. question: Jerome nweere ndị enyị anọ ndị bịara ileta ya n'otu ụbọchị. Enyị nke mbụ pịrị mgbịrịgba ọnụ ụzọ ugboro iri abụọ tupu Jerome e mepee ụzọ, enyị nke abụọ jiri otu ụzọ n'ịme anọ pikarịa ugboro ole enyi Jerome nke mbụ pịrị mgbịrịgba ọnụ ụzọ ahụ. Enyị nke atọ jiri ugboro iri pịa mgbịrịgba ọnụ ụzọ ahụ karịa enyi nke anọ. Ọ bụrụ na enyi nke anọ pịrị ọnụ ụzọ ahụ ugboro iri isii, kedụ ụda ole mgbịrịgba ọnụ ụzọ ahụ daara?
llm: <pad> Enyi nke abụọ pịrị mgbịrịgba ọnụ ụzọ ugboro iri abụọ na abụọ = iri abụọ na anọ. Enyi nke atọ pịrị mgbịrịgba ọnụ ụzọ ugboro iri abụọ na iri abụọ = iri abụọ na itoolu. Enyi nke anọ pịrị mgbịrịgba ọnụ ụzọ ugboro iri isii = iri isii na isii. N'ihi ya, mgbịrịgba ọnụ ụzọ ahụ dara ugboro iri isii na isii = iri abụọ na isii.</s>

question: Solo ga-agụrịrị ibe akwụkwọ anọ n'akwụkwọ mmụta Sanyensị ya, ibe akwụkwọ  iri abụọ n' akwụkwọ mmụta Soshịal Stọdịs, ibe akwụkwọ  asaa n'akwụkwọ mmụta Histri na ibe akwụkwọ asatọ n'akwụkwọ mmụta Giografi. Solo gụrụ ibe akwụkwọ  iri na ise na Mọnde. Ọ bụrụ na o nwere mkpụrụ ụbọchị 4 ozo iji gụchaa ihe niile ọ na-agụ, ibe akwụkwọ ole ka ọ gana ekwesi ịgụ, na nkezi , n'otu ụbọchi?
llm: <pad> Solo ga-agụ ibe akwụkwọ 4 + 12 + 8 + 8 = ibe akwụkwọ iri na abụọ n'otu ụbọchị. Ya mere, ọ ga-agụ ibe akwụkwọ iri na abụọ n'otu ụbọchị.</s>

question: John na-achọ iji otu iko mmiri rie nri ụtụtụ, ehihie na abalị. Na ngwụcha ọ na-añụ otu tupu ọ gaa n'àkwà ndina ọzọ. John na-eme nke a n'ịme ụbọchị ọrụ n'izu ụka ọbụla, mana n'ịme ngwụcha izu ụka, ọ na-amasi ya iji mmanya ọtọ biri biri rie nri abalị kama. Iko mmiri ole ka John na-añụ kwa izu ụka ?
llm: <pad> John na-añụ iko mmiri 3 n'ụbọchị ọrụ n'izu ụka ọbụla. Nke a pụtara na ọ na-añụ iko mmiri 3 x 4 = 12. N'izu ụka ọbụla, ọ na-añụ iko mmiri 12 - 1 = 11 n'izu ụka.</s>

question: Otu fọọgu na-erubata site n'elu osimiri wee kpuchie obodo. Ọ na ewe nkeji iri ịkpuchi mailụ atọ ọbụla n'obodo ahụ. Ọ bụrụ na obodo ahụ dị mailụ iri anọ na abụọ n'ngafe osimiri ahụ site n'ihu oke osimiri ruo n'akụkụ nke ọzọ, nkeji ole ka owere fọọgu ahụ iji kpuchie obodo ahụ niile?

Nke ahụ pụtara na ọ na-ewe nkeji iri ịkpuchi mailụ atọ n'obodo ahụ, yabụ ọ na-ewe nkeji iri ịkpuchi mailụ atọ n'obodo ahụ. Nke ahụ pụtara na ọ na-ewe nkeji iri ịkpuchi mailụ atọ n'obodo ahụ, yabụ ọ na-ewe nkeji iri ịkpuchi mailụ atọ n'obodo ahụ. Nke ahụ pụtara na ọ na-ewe nkeji iri ịkpuchi mailụ atọ n'obodo ahụ, yabụ ọ na-ewe nkeji iri ịkpuchi mailụ atọ n'obodo ahụ. Nke ahụ pụtara na ọ na-ewe nkeji iri ịkpuchi mailụ atọ n'obodo

question: Poppy na-agbakọ otu puku mpempe okwe ọgbagharị. O tinyere mpempe otu n'ịme anọ na bọọdụ ahụ, mgbe ahụ nne ya tinyere otu n'ime atọ ndi mpempe nke ahụ fọrọ. Mpempe okwe ọgbagharị ole fọrọ ka e tinye ha?
llm: <pad> Poppy tinyere mpempe otu n'ime anọ na bọọdụ ahụ, ya mere o nwere mpempe okwe ọgbagharị anọ n'ime anọ ahụ. Nne ya tinyere otu n'ime atọ nke mpempe okwe ọgbagharị ahụ fọrọ, ya mere o nwere mpempe okwe ọgbagharị anọ n'ime atọ ahụ fọrọ. Nke ahụ pụtara na e nwere mpempe okwe ọgbagharị anọ n'ime anọ ahụ fọrọ, nke pụtara na e nwere mpempe okwe ọgbagharị anọ n'ime anọ ahụ fọrọ.</s>

question: Cody n'eri ugboro atọ ọtụtụ kuki ka Amir si eri. Ọ bụrụ na Amir rie kuki ise, kuki ole ka ha abụọ rikọrọ ọnụ?
llm: <pad> Cody n'eri ugboro atọ ọtụtụ kuki ka Amir si eri, yabụ Cody n'eri 3 * 5 = 15 kuki. Ha abụọ nwere kuki 15 + 5 = 20 ọnụ.</s>

question: John nwere akpati atọ. Akpati ọbụla ahụ dị inch ise na mmụba inch isii na mmụba inch anọ. Akụkụ ya dị otu oké inch. Kedụ ozuzu ókè ịme akpati atọ niile ahụ?
llm: <pad> Akpati ọ bụla nwere ozuzu nke 5 + 6 + 4 = 18 inches. Otú ọ dị, ọ dị mkpa iburu n'uche na o nwere ike ịdị iche n'ogologo. N'ihi ya, o nwere ike ịdị iche n'ogologo.</s>

question: Frankie na elele TV mgbe o dechara ọrụ omume ụlọ ya abali ọbụla. Ụbọchị Mọnde na Tuzdee, o kiriri ihe omume nke otu awa nke ihe ngosi na amasị ya abali ọbụla. Ụbọchị wenezdee, o kiriri ihe omume ole na ole nke ihe ngosi nke nkeji iri atọ. Ụbọchị Tọzdee, o dechara ọrụ omume ụlọ ya n'oge ma kirie ihe omume nke otu awa na ihe ngosi nke nkeji iri atọ. Ụbọchị Fraidee,  ọ ga-amụrụ anya maka ngwụcha izu ụka, ya mere o kiriri ihe omume abụọ nke otu awa.  Ọbụrụ na o ji awa asaa kirie TV n'ihe niile, ihe omume nke nkeji iri atọ ole ka o kiri na Wenezdee?
llm: <pad> Frankie kiriri ihe omume nke otu awa na nkeji iri atọ n'ụbọchị Mọnde na Tuzdee, yabụ o kiriri ihe omume nke otu awa * 2 = ihe omume abụọ nke otu awa. Ụbọchị Fraidee, ọ ga-amụrụ anya, ya mere o kiriri ihe omume abụọ nke otu awa, yabụ o kiriri ihe omume abụọ nke otu awa + ihe omume abụọ nke otu awa = ihe omume abụọ nke otu awa. Frankie kiriri ihe omume nke otu awa na nkeji iri atọ n'ụbọchị Tọzdee, yabụ o kiriri ihe omume nke otu awa * 3 nkeji = ihe omume iri atọ na atọ nke nkeji iri atọ. Frankie kiriri ihe omume nke otu awa na nkeji iri atọ n'ụbọchị Fraidee, yabụ o kiriri ihe omume nke otu awa * 2 nkeji = ihe omume abụọ nke otu awa. Frankie kiriri ihe omume nke otu awa na nkeji iri atọ n'ụbọchị Tọzdee, yabụ o kiriri ihe omume nke otu awa * 3 nkeji = ihe omume iri atọ na atọ nke nkeji iri atọ. Frankie kiriri ihe omume nke otu awa na nkeji iri atọ n'ụbọchị Fraidee, yabụ o kiriri ihe omume nke otu awa * 2 nkeji = ihe omume abụọ nke otu awa. Frankie kiriri ihe omume nke otu awa na nkeji iri atọ n'ụbọchị Tọzdee, yabụ o kiriri ihe omume nke otu awa * 3 nkeji = ihe omume iri atọ na atọ nke nkeji iri atọ. Frankie kiriri ihe omume nke otu awa na nkeji iri atọ n'ụbọchị Fraidee, yabụ o kiriri ihe omume nke otu awa * 2 nkeji = ihe omume abụ

question: Henry na-eme achịcha bekee maka asọmpi ighe ịhe n'ogbe. Ọ chọrọ ighe ugboro abụọ n'ịhe o gheere àfọ́ gaara aga. Mgbe o ghechaara achịcha ndị ahụ, ọ chọpụtara na o jiri achịcha iri na ise ghekarịa ole ọ chọbụrụ ịghe. Ọ tụpụrụ achịcha ise dịka ọ na-ewepụta ha ka ha jụọ oyi, ma nwezie achịcha otu narị na iri ugbu a. Achịcha bekee ole ka Henry ghere n'àfọ́ gaara aga?
llm: <pad> Henry ghere achịcha iri na ise karịa achịcha ọ chọbụrụ ịghe, nke pụtara na o ghere achịcha iri na ise + achịcha iri na ise = achịcha iri na isii. Ọ tụpụrụ achịcha ise n'ihi na ọ chọpụtara na o jiri achịcha iri na isii - ise = achịcha iri na isii ghee karịa achịcha ọ chọbụrụ ịghe. N'ihi ya, o ghere achịcha iri na isii + achịcha iri na isii = achịcha iri na itoolu.</s>

question: Otu mpaghara ọdụ gaasị na-ere gaasị $3.00 maka otu galọn. Ụlọ ọrụ app n'enye $.20 ego nnyeghachi ma ọbụrụ n' ịgbaa n'ọdụ a. Ọbụrụ na o nwere onye zụtarụ galọn gaasị iri, ego ole ka gaasị ha ga-abụ, ma emechaa ego nnyeghachi?
llm: <pad> Ọ bụrụ na onye zụtarụ galọn gaasị iri, ego gaasị ha ga-abụ ga-abụ $3.00 * 10 = $30.00. Ọ bụrụ na ụlọ ọrụ app n'enye $.20 ego nnyeghachi ma ọ bụrụ na ịgbaa n'ọdụ ahụ, ego nnyeghachi ahụ ga-abụ $.20 * 30 = $0.20. N'ihi ya, ego gaasị ha ga-abụ ga-abụ $30.00 - $0.20 = $20.00.</s>

question: Ryan kụrụ okooko abụọ n'ubi ya n'otu ụbọchị. ka ụbọchị iri na ise gachara, okooko ole ka o nwere ọbụrụ na ise etoghị?

question: Katy na-eme kọfị jiri ngaji shuga na iko mmiri nha asaa na iri na atọ. Ọ bụrụ na o jiri ngụkọta òké ngaji shuga dị otu narị na iri abụọ na iko mmiri, gbakọọ ngaji shuga ole o jiri mee ịhe?
llm: <pad> Katy jiri ngụkọta òké ngaji shuga dị otu narị na iri abụọ na iko mmiri dị asaa na iri na atọ = 112 òké ngaji shuga. Ọ bụrụ na o jiri ngụkọta òké ngaji shuga dị otu narị na iri abụọ na iko mmiri dị asaa na iri na atọ, o jiri 112 òké ngaji shuga / iko mmiri = 112 òké ngaji shuga / iko mmiri.</s>

question: John zụtara akpụkpụ ukwụ abụọ otunaotu maka ụmụ ya atọ. Ọnụ ego nke ọ bụla bụ $60. Ego ole ka ọ kwụrụ?
llm: <pad> John kwụrụ $60 x 2 = $120.</s>

question: Onye ọrụ kọstọm  nọ n'ọdọ mgbapụta ngwaahịa n'ọdọ ụgbọ mmiri SeaSide gụrụ kọntena na-ebu ụgbọala abụọ a tụbatara ọnụ, otunaotu n'ịme ha nwere ụgbọala ise n'ịme . Ụbọchị n'eso ya,  e bubatara kọntena ndị ọzọ, ma ngụkọta ọnụọgụgụ ụgbọala nọ n'ọdọ ụgbọ mmiri ahụ dị iri atọ. Gbakọọ ọnụọgụgụ kọntena a tụbatara n'ụbọchị nke abụọ ma ọ bụrụ na kọntena niile bu ụgbọala ise?
llm: <pad> Ụgbọala abụọ ahụ bụ ụgbọala iri atọ na atọ n'ịme, yabụ e nwere ụgbọala iri atọ na atọ n'ịme kọntena abụọ ahụ. N'ụbọchị nke abụọ, e bubatara kọntena iri atọ na atọ n'ịme, yabụ e bubatara kọntena iri atọ na atọ n'ịme n'ụbọchị nke abụọ.</s>

question: Ngụkọta ụgwọ ọnwa Adrien bụ pasentị iri atọ karịa nke Lylah. Afọ anọ gasịrị, ụgwọ ọnwa ya mụbara, ọ na-enweta 40% karịa ihe ọ na-enweta afọ anọ gara aga. Ọ bụrụ na ụgwọ ọnwa Adrien na nke Lylah mụbara n'otu oge, na Adrien nwetara $40000 afọ anọ gara aga, gbakọọ ngụkọta ụgwọ ọnwa ha abụọ na-anata afọ anọ gasiri?
llm: <pad> Adrien nwetara $40000 *.3 = $20000. Afọ anọ gasịrị, Adrien nwetara $40000 + $2000 = $44000. N'ihi ya, Adrien nwetara $40000 + $2000 = $48000 afọ anọ gasịrị. N'ihi ya, Adrien nwetara $40000 + $8000 = $45000 afọ anọ gasịrị.</s>

question: Miguel na-eji padi akwụkwọ abụọ ese ịhe. Ọ bụrụ na e nwere mpempe akwụkwọ iri atọ n'ịme otu padi, kedụ mpempe akwụkwọ ole ọ na-eji ese ịhe n'ọnwa ọbụla?
llm: <pad> Miguel na-eji padi akwụkwọ abụọ ese ịhe, yabụ ọ na-eji padi akwụkwọ abụọ * 30 mpempe akwụkwọ / padi = 90 mpempe akwụkwọ ese ịhe n'ọnwa ọbụla.</s>

question: A gwara Morisette na Kael ka ha weta mkpụrụ osisi. Morisette wetara apụl  ise na oroma asatọ, ebe Kael wetara apụl ugboro abụọ na ọkara oroma karịa Morisette. Mkpụrụ osisi ole ka ha nwere na ngụkọta?

question: Sadie rahụrụ ụra awa asatọ n' ụbọchị Mọndee. N'ụbọchị abụọ ndị n'eso ya, o rahụrụ ụra awa abụọ n'ụzọ dị nta karịa, otunaotu, maka na o jiri ya mepụta ịhe ndị chere n'ihu. Ọ bụrụ n'izu ụka fọdụrụ na o jiri otu awa rahụ ụra karịa ụbọchị abụọ ndị ahụ, kedụ awa ole o rahụrụ ụra na ngụkọta n'ịme izu ụka niile ahụ?
llm: <pad> Sadie rahụrụ ụra awa asatọ n'ụbọchị Mọndee. N'ụbọchị abụọ ndị n'eso ya, o rahụrụ ụra awa abụọ n'ụzọ dị nta karịa, otunaotu, n'ihi na o jiri ya mepụta ịhe ndị chere n'ihu. N'izu ụka fọdụrụ, o jiri otu awa rahụ ụra karịa ụbọchị abụọ ndị ahụ, n'ihi ya, o rahụrụ ụra awa asatọ + otu = awa itoolu. N'izu ụka niile, o rahụrụ ụra awa asatọ + awa itoolu = awa iri na isii.</s>

question: Rosie ga-agbanwu ọsọ mailụ iri kwa awa maka awa atọ. Mgbe nke ahụ mechara, ọ na-agba ọsọ mailụ ise kwa awa. Mailụ ole ka ọ ga-agbanwu ọsọ na awa asaa?
llm: <pad> Rosie ga-agba ọsọ 10 * 3 = 30 mail kwa awa maka awa atọ. Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ ga-agba ọsọ 5 * 2 = 10 mail kwa awa maka awa asaa. N'ihi ya, Rosie ga-agba ọsọ 30 + 10 = 40 mail na awa asaa.</s>

question: Jennie na-enye aka n'ụlọ ọrụ nne ya. O nwere ọdọ nnukwu leta iri isii chọrọ stampụ n' ọdọ nnukwu leta ndị e suworori stampụ. O tinyere stampụ n'otu ụzọ na atọ leta ndị na-achọ stampụ. Ọ bụrụ na e nweziri leta iri atọ ugbu a n'ịme ọdọ nnukwu leta ndị e suru stampụ, kedụ leta ole nọ n'ịme ọdọ nnukwu ahụ mgbe Jennie bidoro?
llm: <pad> Jennie tinyere stampụ n'otu ụzọ na atọ leta ndị na-achọ stampụ, yabụ o nwere 6 * 3 = 18 leta ndị na-achọ stampụ. Ọ bụ ezie na e nweziri leta iri atọ ugbu a n'ịme ọdọ nnukwu leta ndị e suru stampụ, ọ bụghị n'ịme ọdọ nnukwu leta ndị e suru stampụ ka Jennie bidoro. Ọ bụ n'ịme ọdọ nnukwu leta ndị e suru stampụ ka Jennie bidoro.</s>

question: Julia na-akwado oriri nri abali n'ụlọ ya, ebe obu na uche ka o keé sitiu. Ọ chọpụtara na o nweghịzị ngaji plasitiki, n'ihi ya ọ zụtara ngwugwu ngaji ohụụ. E mechaa, di ya zụtakwara ngwugwu ngaji ọhụụ ise ma nye ha Julia. Mgbe Julia na-esi sitiu ahụ, o ji ngaji atọ mee nlele sitiu ya , E mecha, mgbe ọ gara idozi tebulu, o nwere ngụkọta ngaji iri na abụọ. Ngaji ole dị n'ime ngwugwu Julia zụtara?
llm: <pad> Julia zụtara ngwugwu ngaji iri na abụọ. Di ya zụtakwara ngwugwu ngaji iri na ise, ya bụ na o nwere ngwugwu ngaji iri na ise + ngwugwu ngaji iri na abụọ = ngwugwu ngaji iri na isii. N'ihi ya, Julia zụtara ngwugwu ngaji iri na isii / ngwugwu ngaji iri na isii = ngaji iri na isii n'ime ngwugwu ngaji iri na isii ọ zụtara.</s>

question: Dylan chọrọ sọseeji anụ ọkụkọ na sọseeji azụ ịji mee sọseeji bọns na mmemme. Ọ zụtara sọseeji ọkụkọ iri atọ na asatọ na sọseeji azụ ji ugboro isii karịa sọseeji ọkụkọ. Kedụ sọseeji ole Dylan zụtaara n'ihe niile?
llm: <pad> Dylan zụtara sọseeji anụ ọkụkọ iri atọ na asatọ na sọseeji azụ iri isii na isii. Nke ahụ pụtara na ọ zụtara sọseeji anụ ọkụkọ iri atọ na asatọ na sọseeji azụ iri isii na isii. Nke ahụ pụtara na ọ zụtara sọseeji anụ ọkụkọ iri atọ na asatọ na sọseeji azụ iri isii na isii. N'ihi ya, Dylan zụtara sọseeji anụ ọkụkọ iri atọ na asatọ na sọseeji azụ iri isii na isii.</s>

question: Mgbe ọ gafechara n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ọhụrụ, Amy metara enyi iri abụọ karịa Lily. Ọ bụrụ na Lily metara enyi iri ise, enyi ole ka Lily na Amy nwekọrọ ọnụ?
llm: <pad> Amy metara enyi iri abụọ karịa Lily, nke pụtara na Lily metara enyi iri ise. Nke a pụtara na Amy metara enyi iri abụọ karịa Lily, nke pụtara na Lily metara enyi iri ise. Nke a pụtara na Lily na Amy nwekọrọ ọnụ enyi iri ise na abụọ.</s>

question: Nne Well na-ere anyụ mmiri, ose na oroma n'ụlọ ahịa ógbè. Otu anyụ mmiri na-efu ọnụ ego ji ugboro atọ karịa ọnụ ego ose ọbụla. Ọnụ ego otu oroma ji ise dị nta karịa ọnụ ego anyụ mmiri. E zipuru Dillon ka ọ gaa n'ụlọ ahịa zụta anyụ mmiri anọ, ose iri abụọ na oroma iri. Kedụ ego ole ọ ga-emefu na ngụkọta ma ọ bụrụ na otu ego ose na-ada $15?
llm: <pad> Dillon ga-emefu 4 x $15 = $40 maka anyụ mmiri. Ọ ga-emefu 2 x $15 = $30 maka ose. Ọ ga-emefu 20 x $15 = $300 maka oroma. N'ihi ya, ọ ga-emefu $40 + $30 + $300 = $540 maka ihe niile.</s>

question: Otu ụlọ ọgwụ na-ahụ mmadụ nari ise kwa ụbọchị. Onye ọrịa ọ bụla  bu nke a na-ahụ maka nkezi nke nkeji iri abụọ na anọ. Ndị dọkịta na-ana $150 otu awa n'ụlọ ọgwụ na ụlọ ọgwụ na-ana ndị ọrịa $200 otu awa. Uru ego ole ka ụlọ ọgwụ na-enweta site na ọbịbịa ndị a?
llm: <pad> Ụlọ ọgwụ na-enweta uru ego nke 150 * 5 = $3000 kwa ụbọchị. Ụlọ ọgwụ na-enweta uru ego nke 200 * 5 = $5000 kwa ụbọchị. N'ihi ya, ụlọ ọgwụ na-enweta uru ego nke 3000 + 5000 = $9000 kwa ụbọchị.</s>

question: Nissa gobiri ndị ọrụ oge ka ha rụọ ọrụ elve n'ịme ụlọ ahịa ya dị n'obodo Santa. Otu ụzọ n'ịme atọ ndị ahụ kwụsịrị ọrụ ka ụmụaka gbọchara agbọọ n'ahụ ha, mgbe ahụ iri n'ịme ha kwụsịrị ka ụmụaka gbachara ha ukwu n'akụkụ. Elve ole fọrọ?
llm: <pad> Otu ụzọ n'ime atọ ndị ahụ kwụsịrị ọrụ ka ụmụaka gbọchara agbọọ n'ahụ ha, yabụ ọ fọrọ otu ụzọ n'ime atọ ndị ahụ - otu ụzọ n'ime atọ = abụọ. Iri n'ime ha kwụsịrị ọrụ ka ụmụaka gbachara ha ukwu n'akụkụ, yabụ ọ fọrọ iri n'ime ha - iri n'ime ha = iri na otu. N'ihi ya, ọ fọrọ iri na otu - iri na otu = iri na abụọ.</s>

question: Ego Joseph mefuru n'onwa Mee bụ $500. Na Junu, mmefu ya ji $60 pekaria mpe. Ego ole bụ ngụkọta mmefu ya na ọnwa abụọ ndị ahụ?
llm: <pad> Joseph mefuru $500 + $60 = $560 na ọnwa abụọ ndị ahụ.</s>

question: Pam na Fred gaara n'emume, Pam nyara rolakosta ugboro abụọ ebe Fred nyara ya ugboro anọ. Ka nke ahụ gasịrị, ha kpebiri ịnya luge ugboro abụọ n'otunaotu. Ọ buru n' otu ọnyinya daara tiketi isii, tiketi ole ka ha mefuru n'ụbọchị ahụ?
llm: <pad> Pam nyara rolakosta ugboro abụọ * 2 = 4 tiketi. Fred nyara rolakosta ugboro anọ * 4 tiketi = 16 tiketi. Ha mefuru tiketi 6 + 16 = 24 n'ụbọchị ahụ.</s>

question: N' ụbọchị Mọndee, Walt gara ije mailị. Tuzdee, ọ gara ugboro 6 ọtụtụ mailụ anọ di ka ọ gara n'ụbọchị Mọndee. Ngụkọta mailụ ya na Mọndee ruo Wenezdee bụ mailụ anọ na otu.Mailụ ole ka ọ gara n'ụbọchị Wenezdee?
llm: <pad> Walt gara ije mailị anọ n'ụbọchị Tuzdee. N'ihi ya, ọ gara ije ugboro 6 * 4 = 24 mailị n'ụbọchị Tuzdee. N'ihi ya, Walt gara ije 24 * 6 = 144 mailị n'ụbọchị Tuzdee. N'ihi ya, Walt gara ije 144 - 24 = 112 mailị n'ụbọchị Wenezdee.</s>

question: Tom na-enweta ọ̀sị́sà ụgbọala ugboro anọ n'ọnwa. Ọ bụrụ na ụgbọala ọbụla ọ saara na-efu $15 kedụ ego ole ọ na-emefu n'àfọ́?
llm: <pad> Tom na-emefu $15 x 4 = $40.</s>

question: Enyi Brian Bobby nwere ihe egwuregwu vidio ise pekaria ugboro atọ dị ka Brian nwere. Ọ bụrụ na Brian nwere ihe egwuregwu vidio iri abụọ mana ise furu tupu e mee ntule a, ole ka Bobby nwere?
llm: <pad> Bobby nwere ihe egwuregwu vidio iri abụọ na abụọ n'ihi na 20 - 5 = 15. Bobby nwere ihe egwuregwu vidio iri na isii n'ihi na 15 x 3 = 60.</s>

question: E nwere ịnyịnya puru iche iri abụọ na asaa fọrọ n'ịme ụwa. Otu n'ịme atọ n'ịme ha nọ n'ịme Scottish Highlands. Abụọ n'ịme atọ ịnyịnya puru iche Scott bụ nwaanyị. Kedụ ịnyịnya puru iche nwaanyịScott ole nọ ebe ahụ?
llm: <pad> Otu n'ime atọ n'ime ịnyịnya puru iche Scott bụ nwaanyị, yabụ e nwere ịnyịnya puru iche nwaanyị Scott iri abụọ na asaa nọ ebe ahụ.</s>

question: Rory tụrụ ahia sọb abụọ maka $7.50 nke ọ bụla, akpa chịpsu abụọ maka $1.50 na kuki abụọ maka $1.00 nke ọ bụla maka mwegara. E nwere 20% ego mwegara agbakọnyere ebe ikwụ ụgwọ ma ọ chọrọ igbakọnye onyinye afọ ofufo $5.00. Ego ole ka mwegara ihe ọ tụrụ ga a pụta?
llm: <pad> Ụgwọ mwegara bụ $7.50 * 2 = $15.00. Ụgwọ mwegara bụ $15.00 *.2 = $3.00. Ụgwọ mwegara bụ $15.00 + $3.00 + $5.00 = $27.00.</s>

question: Kim e bidola ịgba mbọ azụmahịa ọrụ ị na-echekwa ụlọ ma ọ na-agbakọ uru ego ole ọ ga-enweta site n'aka ndị ahịa ya. O nwelarị ndị ahịa atọ, mana ọ na-agwa ndị ahịa ise ndị ọzọ okwu ma nwee ntụkwasị obi nke mere na ọ gụnyere ha na mgbakọ ndị o mere. Ụlọ onye ahịa ọbụla ga-achọ karama blich abụọ na akpa ákwà a ga-asụ. Karama blich ga-ada $2 na akpa ákwà ga-ada $5 maka otu. Nke a bu naani mmefu ego ọ ga-eme. Ọ gbakọrọ ego niile ọ ga-enweta n'izu ụka ga-abụ $92. Uru bụ ndiiche dị n'etiti ego a kpatara na ego e mefuru, ya mere ego ole na dọla ka Lucas ga-akpata kwa izu ụka?
llm: <pad> Lucas ga-akpata $92 - $2 - $5 = $54 kwa izu ụka.</s>

question: John nwere hekta iri nke ubi akwụolu. Enwere akwụolu 100 na hekta ọ bụla. John ga-eme owuweihe ubi akwụolu ya kwa ọnwa 3 ọ bụla. Akwụolu ole ka John ga-emenwu owuweihe ubi n'ime otu afọ?

question: Johnny na-ewere ịhe egwuregwu n'ala ịme ụlọ ya. Ọ dọbara lego nwere iberiibe narị ise e tinyere n'ịme akpati n'ala, na ọzọkwa nwere iberiibe ugboro atọ karịa nke narị ise, nakwa ọzọ nwere otu ụzọ n'ịme anọ n'ọnụọgụgụ iberiibe lego. Kedụ blọk ole Johnny chitaara ma ọ bụrụ ọ chịkọtara lego niile ahụ?
llm: <pad> Johnny nwere iberiibe narị ise * 3 = iri atọ na atọ. Nke ahụ pụtara na o nwere iberiibe iri atọ na atọ * iri atọ na atọ = iri abụọ na isii. Nke ahụ pụtara na o nwere iberiibe iri abụọ na isii + iri abụọ na isii = iri abụọ na isii. N'ihi ya, Johnny nwere iberiibe iri abụọ na isii + iri abụọ na isii = iri abụọ na isii.</s>

question: Debra n' eleba ụlọ an̄ụ anya ihụ an̄ụ ole na-abịa ma na-apụ n'otu ụbọchị. Ọ na-ahụ an̄ụ iri atọ ka ha na-apụ n'ụlọ an̄ụ ahụ n'ime awa isii nke mbụ, o wee hụ na otu ụzọ n'ime abụọ na ọtụtụ an̄ụ na-alaghachi n'ime awa isii na-esote. Ọ hụ ugboro abụọ di ka ọtụtụ an̄ụ dị ka ọ hụrụ na mbụ pụrụ n'ụlọ an̄ụ ahụ fepụ n'ụlọ an̄ụ ahụ ma pụọ n'ime awa isii na-esote. Mgbe an̄ụ ọ bụla pụbụrụ nke na-alaghachịbeghi na-alaghachi n'ụlọ an̄ụ n'ime awa isii na-esote. An̄ụ ole ka Debra hụrụ laghachiri n'ụlọ an̄ụ ahụ n'ime awa isii ikpeazụ nke ụbọchị ahụ?
llm: <pad> Debra hụrụ an̄ụ iri atọ na abụọ laghachiri n'ụlọ an̄ụ ahụ n'ime awa isii ikpeazụ nke ụbọchị ahụ. Ọ hụrụ an̄ụ iri atọ na abụọ pụọ n'ụlọ an̄ụ ahụ n'ime awa isii nke mbụ, o wee hụ na otu ụzọ n'ime abụọ na ọtụtụ an̄ụ na-alaghachi n'ime awa isii na-esote. Ọ hụ ugboro abụọ di ka ọtụtụ an̄ụ dị ka ọ hụrụ na mbụ pụrụ n'ụlọ an̄ụ ahụ fepụ n'ụlọ an̄ụ ahụ ma pụọ n'ime awa isii na-esote. Mgbe an̄ụ ọ bụla pụbụrụ nke na-alaghachịbeghi na-alaghachi n'ụlọ an̄ụ n'ime awa isii na-esote. N'ihi ya, Debra hụrụ an̄ụ iri atọ na abụọ laghachiri n'ụlọ an̄ụ ahụ n'ime awa isii ikpeazụ nke ụbọchị ahụ.</s>

question: Brittany na nne ya na-aga n'ebe ngosi nkà. Ego a na-akwụ iji banye n'ime bụ $12 maka ndị okenye na $10 maka ụmụntakịrị. Nne Brittany nyere onye nnakọta ego maka otu tiketi nwata na otu tiketi okenye. Ọ bụrụ na ọ natara ego mgbanwe $8, ego ole, na dọla, ka o nyeere onye nnakọta ego?
llm: <pad> Nne Brittany nyere onye nnakọta ego $12 + $10 = $20.</s>

question: Charlie nwere ugboro atọ dị ka ọtụtụ ndi enyi na Facebook dị ka Dorothy. James nwere ugboro anọ dị ka ọtụtụ ndị enyi na Facebook dị ka Dorothy. Ọ bụrụ na Charlie nwere ndị enyi iri na abụọ na Facebook, ndị enyi Facebook ole ka James nwere?
llm: <pad> Dorothy nwere 12 x 3 = 36 ndị enyi na Facebook. James nwere 36 x 4 = 144 ndị enyi na Facebook.</s>

question: Steve na Tim kpebiri ịhu onye nwere ị́ké iru ụlọ ọsọsọ. Steve bi oteáká karịa Tim, ya mere a hapụrụ ya ka ọ nyaa ịnyịnya ígwè ya. Steve bi mailụ atọ site n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ma nwee ị́ké inya ịnyịnya ígwè na fiiti narị anọ na iri anọ kwa nkeji. Tim bi mailụ abụọ site n'ụlọ akwụkwọ. Ọ bụrụ na Tim nwere ị́ké ịnya sketbọọdụ ya fiiti narị abụọ na iri isii na anọ kwa nkeji, oge ole ka onye meriri ga-anọ n'ụlọ ya tupu onye daara ada a gbacha ọsọ ahụ?
llm: <pad> Steve nwere ike ịnya ịnyịnya ígwè ya na 400 ft/min * 3 miles = 1200 ft/min. Tim nwere ike ịnya ịnyịnya ígwè ya na 200 ft/min * 2 miles = 400 ft/min. N'ihi ya, Tim ga-anọ n'ụlọ ya n'ime nkeji 120 - 400 = 60. Onye meriri ga-anọ n'ụlọ ya n'ime nkeji 60 - 60 = 30.</s>

question: Shawnda kpebiri na ụmụaka agbataobi ya nwere ike n'ezie iji ọrụ ihe eji etinye ikuku na ịnyịnya igwe. Ọ kpebiri na ụzọ kacha mma iji naa ụgwọ bụ na taya. Taya ọ bụla nọ n'ọnụ ahịa senti 25 iji tinye ikuku. N'ụbọchị nke mbụ, mmadụ ise nọ n' ịnyịnya igwe bịara itinye ikuku na taya ha abụọ. Mmadụ atọ bịara itinye ikuku na taya ịnyịnya ụkwụ atọ ha niile. N'ikpeazụ, otu onye bịara n'ezie n' ịnyịnya otu ụkwụ. Dọla ole ka o nwetara n'ụbọchị ahụ?
llm: <pad> Shawnda nwetara $0.25 x 5 = $10 site na ịnyịnya igwe. Shawnda nwetara $0.25 x 3 = $6.25 site na ịnyịnya ụkwụ atọ. Shawnda nwetara $0.25 x 1 = $0.25 site na ịnyịnya otu ụkwụ. N'ihi ya, Shawnda nwetara $10 + $6.25 + $0.25 = $11.25 n'ụbọchị ahụ.</s>

question: Carl na-azụta pakeeti achịcha kuki iri. Otunaotu pakeeti ndị ahụ nwere achịcha isii n'ịme. Otunaotu achịcha na-ada $0.10. Ego mgbanew ole ka Carl ga-anata ma ọ bụrụ n' o jiri akwụkwọ ego $10 kwụọ ụgwọ?
llm: <pad> Carl ga-enweta 10 x 6 = 60 achịcha. Ya mere, ọ ga-enweta 10 x $0.10 = $10.</s>

question: Dave zụtara nnukwu ngwugwu ihe eghere eghe frenchị ma taa iri na anọ tutu seagull agụ n'agụ zuru ngwugwu ahụ n'aka ya. Mgbe seagull ahụ rịdatara, o riri ọsọsọ ọkara ihe eghere eghe frenchị ole Dave tara. Nduru atọ kpapụrụ ya na nri ahụ, nduru ọ bụla riri ihe eghere eghe atọ. Emechaa, rakuunu zuru ụzọ abụọ n'ime atọ ihe eghere eghe fọdụrụ. Ndanda bupuru nke ịkpeazụ ihe eghere eghe fọdụrụ, were hapụ ise n'azụ. Ihe eghere eghe ole dị n'ime ngwugwu ahụ mgbe Dave zụtara ya?
llm: <pad> Dave tara 14 + 3 = 17 ihe eghere eghe. N'ihi ya, e nwere 17 - 14 = 7 ihe eghere eghe fọdụrụ n'ime ngwugwu ahụ mgbe Dave zụtara ya.</s>

question: N'ụbọchị Mọndee, Wenezdee, na Fraịdee, nwata akwụkwọ kọlej Kimo nwere klasị otu-awa atọ kwa ụbọchị. N'ụbọchị Tuzdee na Tọzdee, o nwere klasị awa abụọ otunaotu kwa ụbọchị. N'otu sịmesta, e nwere izu ụka iri na isii nke agụmakwụkwọ. N'otu sịmesta, awa ole ka Kimo mefuru iji gaa klasị?
llm: <pad> Kimo nwere klasị otu-awa atọ kwa ụbọchị n'ụbọchị Mọndee, Wenezdee, na Fraịdee, nke bụ 3 * 3 = 9 awa. N'ụbọchị Tuzdee na Tọzdee, o nwere klasị abụọ otunaotu kwa ụbọchị, nke bụ 2 * 11 = 22 awa. N'otu sịmesta, Kimo mefuru awa 9 + 22 = 33 iji gaa klasị.</s>

question: Bill n'eme rolu nari atọ, chokoleti kroisant nari iri abụọ, na baguette iri isii ụbọchị ọ bụla. Rolu ọ bụla di ogologo inchị anọ, kroisant ọ bụla di ogologo inchị isii na baguette ọ bụla dị ogologo ụkwụ abụọ. Ọ bụrụ na Bill tinye ngwa ahia nille o mere na ngwụcha na ngwụcha, ogologo ole ka ha ga-adị n'ụkwụ?
llm: <pad> Bill na-eme ihe dị ka 3 * 100 = 300 rolls. Ọ na-eme ihe dị ka 2 * 200 = 400 chokoleti kroisant. Ọ na-eme ihe dị ka 6 * 100 = 600 baguettes. N'ihi ya, ọ na-eme ihe dị ka 300 + 400 + 600 = 1200 ụkwụ.</s>

question: Onye nlekọta ebe nkiri ụmụ anụmanụ na-enye myiri mmadụ nille nọ n'ebe nkiri ụmụ anụmanụ nri. Ọ na-atụ ahịa unere niile site n'ugbo dị nso ọnwa abụọ ọbụla. question: Blake na Kelly na-asọ mpi ịhụ onye ga-agba ọsọ karia na nkeji iri na ise. Ha kpebiri ime ya n'ebe egwuregwu bọọlụ nke dị otu nari yad n'ogologo. Blake na-agba ọsọ iga iru na ilaghachi azụ ugboro iri na ise. Kelly na-agba ọsọ iga iru na ilaghachi  azụ otu ugboro, emecha o kpebie na ọ chọghị  ịgba ọsọ n'akụkụ Blake, ya mere ọ malitere ịgba ọsọ gaa na akara 40-yad na azụ. Ọ na-eme nke a ugboro iri atọ na anọ. Kedụụ ogologo ole onye meriri na-agba ọsọ karịa onye emeriri?
llm: <pad> Blake na-agba ọsọ n'ogologo 120 yad. Kelly na-agba ọsọ n'ogologo 40 yad. N'ihi ya, Blake na-agba ọsọ n'ogologo 120 yad - 40 yad = 110 yad. N'ihi ya, onye meriri na-agba ọsọ n'ogologo 110 yad - 110 yad = 90 yad karịa onye emeriri.</s>

question: Raphael gaara izuta ụfọdụ ngwa ụlọakwụkwọ. Ọ zụrụ mkpịsị edemede anọ nke daara $1.5 otunaotu,akwụkwọ edemede abụọ nke daara $4 otunaotu, na rịmu akwụkwọ ekechiri ekechi nke daara $20. Ego ole ka Raphael mefuru n'ịhe niile?
llm: <pad> Raphael mefuru $1.5 x 4 = $6.5 maka mkpịsị edemede. Ọ mefuru $4 x 2 = $8 maka akwụkwọ edemede. Ọ mefuru $20 x 2 = $40. N'ihi ya, Raphael mefuru $6.5 + $8 + $40 = $45.</s>

question: Finn na-ekiri nwa awọ iri na otu na-egwu mmiri n'ọdọ mmiri ahụ. Ozigbo ozigbo ọ hụrụ ha isii ka ha pụtara n'ebe ha zoro site n'okpuru lily pad, o wee hụkwa ha abụọ zoro n'okpuru nkume. Kedụ nwa awọ ole Finn nwere ike ịhụ na ọdọ mmiri ugbu a?
llm: <pad> Finn nwere ike ịhụ nwa awọ 11 + 6 = 15 na ọdọ mmiri ugbu a.</s>

question: Anakin na Locsin gara n'osimiri taa. Anakin jidere starfish iri,  ịnyịnya oké osimiri isii, na clownfish atọ. Mgbe Locsin jidere ise dị ole na ole starfish karịa Anakin, atọ dị ole na ole ịnyịnya oké osimiri karịa Anakin, na clownfish abụọ ọzọ karịa Anakin. Azụ ole ka ha nwere ike ịnwụde?
llm: <pad> Anakin jidere 10 + 6 = 14 starfish. Locsin jidere 14 + 3 = 17 ịnyịnya oké osimiri. Ha nwere ike ịnwụde 14 + 17 + 3 = 42 azụ.</s>

question: Ọ bụrụ na akpa mabulu na-ada $20 ma ọnụ ahịa jiri 20% gbagoo n'ego ole a na-ere ya na mbụ kwa ọnwa abụọ ọbụla, ego ole ka akpa mabulu ga-ada ma ọnwa iri atọ na isii gasia?
llm: <pad> Akpa mabulu ga-ada $20*.2=$4 kwa ọnwa iri atọ na isii</s>

question: N'ime ụlọ, e nwere ihe egwuregwu dị iche iche: ụgbọ ala n'acha ọbara ọbara ose, fịgọ atọ, na nwa bebi. Nwa bebi ahụ na-eri ọtụtụ ego ka fịgọ atọ na otu ụgbọ ala ọbara ọbara na-ada $4. Ego ole ka ihe egwuregwu ụmụntakịrị niile pụtara, ọ bụrụ na fịgọ pụtara $5?
llm: <pad> Nwa bebi ahụ na-eri $4 + $3 + $4 = $9. N'ihi ya, ihe egwuregwu ụmụntakịrị niile pụtara $9 + $5 = $18.</s>

question: Maka ụbọchị ọmụmụ 30th ya, Elvira họrọ kọmputa ọhụrụ nwere ọtụtụ ngwa dị ka onyinye. O nwere atumatu mmefu ego nke €1500 nke ezinụlọ ya niile nyere ya ma chee na ya ga-enwe ike idebe obere ego iji nwetanwu ákwà. Ọ gara ụlọ ahịa kọmputa wee họrọ igwe nke pụtara €1090 nke nwere screen, keyboard na mouse. O nwerekwarari scanner maka €157, ihe ọkụ CD ruru €74 yana ngwa nbipute maka €102. Ego ole ka o nwere fọdụrụ ya maka ákwà ya?
llm: <pad> Elvira na-emefu ego ahụ n'ozuzu ya: 1090 + 157 + 74 + 102 = € 1374. Ya mere, o nwere ego dị iche iche o nwere iji nweta ákwà: 1374 - 1500 = € 143.</s>

question: Onye agbataobi Sandra na-enye ya nkata àkwá itoolu oge ọbụla o kuru nwa ya nwaanyị. Ị ji mee Spanish flanu, ọ ga-eji àkwá atọ. Ọ bụrụ na e kenyere Sandra ọrụ ịme flanu Spanish iri na ise maka ịchụnta ego nke ụlọakwụkwọ ya, ugboro ole ka Sandra kwesiri iku nwa?
llm: <pad> Sandra kwesịrị iku nwa ya nwaanyị ugboro itoolu. Nke a bụ n'ihi na ọ na-enweta àkwá itoolu n'otu oge, nke pụtara na ọ ga-enweta àkwá itoolu n'otu oge. Ọ bụrụ na Sandra emee flanu Spanish iri na ise, ọ ga-eji àkwá atọ eme ihe, nke pụtara na ọ ga-eji àkwá atọ eme ihe n'otu flanu. Nke a pụtara na Sandra ga-eji àkwá atọ eme ihe n'otu flanu, nke pụtara na ọ ga-eji àkwá atọ eme ihe n'otu flanu. N'ihi ya, Sandra kwesịrị iku nwa ya nwaanyị ugboro itoolu.</s>

question: Seth dị afo ugboro abụọ di ka Brooke. N'ime afọ abụọ, mgbakọta afọ ha ga-abụ iri abụọ na asatọ. Afọ ole ka Seth dị?
llm: <pad> Seth dị afọ iri abụọ na asatọ ugbu a.</s>

question: Jimmy nwere $2 karịa ugboro abụọ ego Ethel nwere. Ọ bụrụ na Ethel nwere $8, ego ole ka Jimmy nwere?
llm: <pad> Jimmy nwere $8 + $2 = $10.</s>

question: Pancho na-aga ije mailụ iri abụọ n'ụbọchị. Ewezuga ngwụcha izu ụka mgbe ọ na-aga ije mailụ iri. Mailụ ole ka ọ na-aga n'otu izu?
llm: <pad> Pancho na-aga ije mailụ 20 x 7 = 140 n'otu izu.</s>

question: Ndị ọ̀kụ̀égwú n'ahiri na-atụ ahịa uwe njirimara ọhụrụ. Otu n'uwe njirimara ahụ na-ebu okpu na-ada $25, na jakeeti na-ada ọnụahịa dị ugboro atọ ịhe a na-ere okpu, na ọbante nke ọnụahịa ya na-ada nkezi ọnụahịa okpu na jakeeti. Ego ole ka uwe njirimara na-ada na ngụkọta?
llm: <pad> Okpu na-ada $25*3=$$75. Jakeeti na-ada $75+$75=$150. Ọnụahịa nke ọbante bụ 150*.5=$75 N'ihi ya, uwe njirimara ahụ na-ada $150+$75=$200.</s>

question: Jake na-agafe na Museum of Entomology. Ọ na-ahụ ududo iri asatọ nwere ụkwụ asatọ otunaotu, arụrụ iri itoolu nwere ụkwụ isii otunaotu, na mutant invertebrates atọ anaghi ahukari nwere ụkwụ iri otunaotu. Ụkwụ ole ka Jake na-ahụ na ngụkọta?
llm: <pad> Jake na-ahụ ududo iri asatọ nwere ụkwụ asatọ otunaotu, arụrụ iri itoolu nwere ụkwụ isii otunaotu, na mutant invertebrates atọ anaghi ahukari nwere ụkwụ iri otunaotu, yabụ ọ na-ahụ ududo iri asatọ + arụrụ iri itoolu + mutant invertebrates atọ = ụkwụ iri itoolu na otu. N'ihi ya, Jake na-ahụ ụkwụ iri itoolu na otu + ụkwụ iri itoolu na otu = ụkwụ iri itoolu na abụọ.</s>

question: E nwere nnụnụ anọ na Caboose. Sally Two dị áfọ̀ atọ karịa Granny Red. Granny Red di áfọ̀ dị ugboro abụọ dịka nke Sally Four. Ọ bụrụ na Sally Four dị áfọ̀ ole Sally Thirtytwo dị, ma Sally Thirtytwo dị áfọ̀ asatọ, kedụ áfọ̀ ole na ngụkọta nnụnụ anọ ndị ahụ dị?
llm: <pad> Granny Red dị áfọ̀ abụọ dị ka nke Sally Four, yabụ ọ dị áfọ̀ abụọ * áfọ̀ asatọ = áfọ̀ iri na asatọ. Nnụnụ anọ ndị ahụ dị áfọ̀ iri na asatọ + áfọ̀ asatọ + áfọ̀ iri na asatọ = áfọ̀ iri na itoolu.</s>

question: Jessica na-agbalị ịchọpụta ego ole ọ ga-akwụ n'ụgwọ niile o ji kwa ọnwa. Ego mbinye nwa akwụkwọ ya nwere ịkwụ ụgwọ opekempe $300/ọnwa, n'ikacha nta kredit kaadị ya bụ $200/ọnwa, n'ikacha nta nke motgeji ya bụ $500/ọnwa. Ọ bụrụ na Jessica chọrọ ịkwụ karia n'ikacha nta 50%, ego ole ka ọ na-akwụ n'ime otu afọ?
llm: <pad> Jessica ga-akwụ ụgwọ ọnwa iri na isii. Ọ ga-akwụ ụgwọ ọnwa iri na isii * $300 / ọnwa = $1200 kwa ọnwa. Ọ ga-akwụ ụgwọ ọnwa iri na isii * $200 / ọnwa = $600 kwa ọnwa. question: Billy na-ebecha ma na-egbubi ndukwu maka ịme sálàd maka imi anụ e ji eme mmemme lọghachi nke ezinụlọ. Ọ bụ nnukwu mmemme, ya mere o nwere ndukwu iri isii ịji gafere. Ndukwu ndị ahụ dịka ka ha bụ otu nha, ya mere ọ na-ewe otu oge ịji bechaa na gbujie otu. Ọ na-ewe Billy ịhe dịka otu nkeji na ọkara iji bechaa otu ndukwu, mana naanị sekọndu ise ịji gbujie ya. Oge ole ka ọ ga-ewe Billy ịji kwadocha ndukwu ndị ahụ?
llm: <pad> Ọ na-ewe Billy nkeji 1.5 iji bechaa otu ndukwu, yabụ ọ ga-ewe nkeji 1.5 + sekọnd 5 = nkeji 2.5 iji bechaa ndukwu iri isii. Ọ na-ewe Billy nkeji 2.5 iji bechaa ndukwu iri isii, yabụ ọ ga-ewe nkeji 2.5 + nkeji 6 = nkeji 7.5 iji bechaa ndukwu iri isii.</s>

question: N'ọsọ ndị Asia narị abụọ na iri anọ, mmadụ iri asatọ bụ ndị Japan, ma ndị ọzọ bụ ndị China. Ọ bụrụ na ọnụọgụgụ ụmụntakịrị nwoke n'otú ndị China bụ iri isii, ụmụntakịrị nwaanyị ole nọ n'otu ndị China?
llm: <pad> Ọ bụrụ na ụmụ nwoke n'otu ndị China bụ iri isii, ụmụ nwaanyị n'otu ndị China bụ iri isii na isii. Nke a bụ n'ihi na ọ bụ ụmụ nwaanyị iri isii na isii n'otu ndị China.</s>

question: Zaid na-emefu otu ụzọ n'ime anọ ụgwọ ọnwa ya na ụgwọ ụlọ,  otu ụzọ n'ime atọ na mmanụ ụgbọala ma na-enye onyinye nkwado ọkara nke ole fọdụrụ n'ụlọ ebere kacha amasị ya. Ọ na-enye nwa ya nwanyị 200$ iji na-eme mmefu izu ụka ya ma nye nwunye ya 700$ maka iji kwádōō atumatu mmefu ego maka ngwa nri na ihe ndị ọzọ na-adị n'ụlọ. Ọ bụrụ na Zaid na-enweta 6000$ kwa ọnwa, ego ole ka ọ ga-enwe ma o mecha mmefu niile a na onyinye nkwado ?
llm: <pad> Zaid na-emefu otu ụzọ n'ime anọ ụgwọ ọnwa ya na ụgwọ ụlọ, otu ụzọ n'ime atọ na mmanụ ụgbọala ma na-enye onyinye nkwado ọkara nke ole fọdụrụ n'ụlọ ebere kacha amasị ya. Ọ na-enye nwa ya nwanyị 200$ iji na-eme mmefu izu ụka ya ma nye nwunye ya 700$ maka iji kwádōō atumatu mmefu ego maka ngwa nri na ihe ndị ọzọ na-adị n'ụlọ. Ọ bụrụ na Zaid na-enweta 6000$ kwa ọnwa, ọ ga-enwe 6000$ - 200$ - 700$ = 4000$ fọdụrụ.</s>

question: Rani nwere nshikọ iri karịa Monic, onye nshikọ ya ji anọ dị nta karịa nke Bo. Ọ bụrụ na Bo nwere nshikọ iri anọ, gbakọọ na ngụkọta ọnụọgụgụ nshikọ mmadụ atọ ahụ nwekọrọ ọnụ.
llm: <pad> Monic nwere nshikọ iri anọ - anọ = iri na abụọ. N'ihi ya, ọnụọgụgụ nshikọ ndị ahụ bụ iri na abụọ + iri na abụọ = iri abụọ na abụọ. N'ihi ya, ngụkọta ọnụọgụgụ nshikọ ndị ahụ bụ iri abụọ na abụọ + iri abụọ = iri abụọ na isii.</s>

question: Lloyd na enweta $10 n'otu awa nkuzi maasị. Ọ kuziri awa ise n'izu ụka nke mbụ na awa asatọ n'izu ụka nke abụọ. Ego ole ka o nwetara maka izu ụka abụọ nke mbu?
llm: <pad> Lloyd nwetara $10 x 5 = $50 maka izu ụka abụọ nke mbụ. N'izu ụka nke abụọ, ọ nwetara $10 x 8 = $40. N'izu ụka abụọ nke mbụ, o nwetara $50 + $40 = $90.</s>

question: Ndị ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị abụọ na-azọ onye ga-anọchi anya klasị n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Sarai. Ọ bụrụ na onye meriri nwetara vootu ụzọ atọ n'ịme anọ ma ọnụọgụgụ ụmụakwụkwọ ndị niile tụrụ vootu na klasị dị iri asatọ, gbakọọ ọnụọgụgụ vootu onye daara nwetara?
llm: <pad> Ọnụ ọgụgụ ụmụakwụkwọ ndị tụrụ vootu na klas bụ iri asatọ, yabụ onye meriri nwetara ụzọ atọ n'ime anọ. Nke a pụtara na onye meriri nwetara ụzọ atọ n'ime anọ * 4 = 16 vootu. Nke a pụtara na onye daara nwetara 16 - 4 = 12 vootu.</s>

question: Sandra, onye ọkụụ okooko na gburugburu, enweghị obi ụtọ na nwega ihe Fred ezughị ezu. Sandra tụrụ ahịa ugboro anọ di ọtụtụ rosu ọbara ọbara dị ka carnations ọcha. Ọ tụkwara ahịa pịnki calla lilies 200, nke dị ugboro ise ọnụ ọgụgụ carnations ọcha. Sandra eyiela ya egwu ịgbanwe ndị na-ebunye ahịa ma ọ bụrụ na o wetaghị rosu ọbara ọbara ahụ na-efu na 5 pm. Iji dobe azụmahịa Sandra, rosu ọbara-ọbara ole ka Fred ga-ewega na 5pm?
llm: <pad> Sandra tụrụ ahịa 4 * 200 = 800 roses ọbara ọbara. Fred ga-ewega 800 + 200 = 1200 roses ọbara ọbara na 5 pm.</s>

question: Jean ji áfọ̀ abụọ tọọ Mark. N'àfọ́ abụọ gaara aga Mark ji áfọ̀ ise karịa ọkara áfọ̀ ole Jan dị. Ọ bụrụ na Jan dị áfọ̀ iri atọ Jean ọ dị áfọ̀ ole?
llm: <pad> Jean dị áfọ̀ iri atọ na abụọ.</s>

question: Otu abụọ na-agba ọsọ na-asọ mpi na ọsọ anọ site mita relay nari anọ, ọsọ ebe ndị otu ọ bụla na-asọmpi nwere ndị otu anọ nke onye ọ bụla na-agba ọsọ mita nari anọ, ma ọ bụ otu ụkwụ,  gburugburu ọkọlọtọ. question: Jerry na-atụ mkpụrụ okwe ịhụ isii. Kedụ otu ọzọ o nwekariri ị́ké ịtụ ya (akpọpụta ya dịka pesenti) ka ọ bụrụ ọnụọgụgụ dị ugboro atọ karịa na ọ tụrụ ọnụọgụgụ abụọ enwere ị́ké ike nhatanha?

question: Jenna na nne ya tụtụtara apụl ụfọdụ n'ubi apụl ha. Jenna tụtụtara ọkara  ọtụtụ apụl dị ka nne ya . Ọ bụrụ na nne ya nwetara apụl iri abụọ, apụl ole ka ha abụọ tụtụrụ?
llm: <pad> Jenna tụtụtara apụl iri abụọ na abụọ / 2 = iri na otu. Ha abụọ tụtụtara apụl iri na otu.</s>

question: Russell na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ahịa na-ere anụ ụlọ na ekesakwa ahịhịa n'etiti ókè ndị ahụ. A na-edebe ókè ndị ahụ n'ịme ngiga atọ n'otú nhatanha ma a na-enye ókè ọbụla iberiibe ahịhịa isii. E nwere ngiga hamster iri a na-edosa iche ma a na-enye hamster ọbụla iberiibe ahịhịa ise. E nwekwara ụlọ oke oyibo ebe a na-ekesa iberiibe ahịhịa iri abụọ n'etiti ewi ndị ahụ. O nweghị ahịhịa e ji eme ịhe ebe ọzọ n'ụlọ ahịa ahụ. Ọ bụrụ na ekesala iberiibe ahịhịa narị na iri isii n'etiti ókè obere, kedụ ókè ole nọ n'otu ngiga?
llm: <pad> E nwere ngiga iri abụọ na abụọ n'ozuzu ha, yabụ e nwere ngiga iri abụọ na abụọ n'otu ngiga. Ọ bụrụ na e nwere iberiibe ahịhịa narị na iri isii n'etiti ókè obere, mgbe ahụ e nwere iberiibe ahịhịa narị na iri isii n'otu ngiga, yabụ e nwere iberiibe ahịhịa narị na iri isii n'otu ngiga. Ọ bụrụ na e nwere iberiibe ahịhịa iri abụọ n'otu ngiga, mgbe ahụ e nwere iberiibe ahịhịa iri abụọ n'otu ngiga. question: Mandy ji Benedict ụgwọ $100. Ha kwekọrịtara inwe uma kwa ọnwa nke bu 2%. Ọ bụrụ na Mandy nwere ike ịkwụ ya mgbe ọnwa atọ gachara, ego ole ka ọ ga-enye Benedict?
llm: <pad> Mandy ga-akwụ Benedict $100 x.2 = $20 kwa ọnwa. N'ihi ya, ọ ga-akwụ Benedict $100 + $20 = $120.</s>

question: Ọzụahịa na-azụta ụfọdụ akpa ọka wit n'aka onye ọrụ ugbo n'ọnụ ego $20 maka otu akpa. Ọ bụrụ na ọ ga-efu $2 ịji buru otu akpa site n'ugbo ruo n'ụlọ nchekwa ibu, ma ọzụahịa ahụ ritere $400 n'uru ka o rechara akpa niile n'ọnụ ego $30 maka otu akpa, akpa ole ka o rere?
llm: <pad> Ọzụahịa ahụ rere akpa ọka wit iri na abụọ n'ọnụ ego $30 maka otu akpa, yabụ ọ rere akpa ọka wit iri na abụọ.</s>

question: Enyi atọ mefuru $20.25 na tikeeti atọ maka ngosi ahụ. Ha mefukwara $4.50 pekarịa na nri karịa na tikeeti. Ha gakwara ihe ọnyịnya abụọ dị iche iche nke riri ha $33 maka ịnya ihe ọ bụla. Ọ bụrụ na ha kpebiri ikewa ọnụ ego niile ahụ nhatanha, ego ole ka onye ọ bụla kwụrụ?
John na-anara piich maka awa atọ. O nwere ị́ké ịnara piich abụọ n'otu nkeji. Piich ole ka ọ natara?
llm: <pad> John natara piich abụọ n'otu nkeji n'ihi na awa atọ bụ 3/60 = 1/15 nkeji. N'ihi ya, ọ natara piich abụọ n'otu nkeji n'ihi na 1/15 * 1/14 = piich abụọ.</s>

question: Tom na-akụ osisi iri n'àfọ́. Áfọ̀ ọbụla ọ na-egbutukwa osisi abụọ kwa áfọ̀. O jiri osisi iri ise bido. Ka áfọ̀ iri gasịrị 30% osisi ahụ nwụrụ. Kedụ osisi ole o nwere fọdụrụ?
llm: <pad> Tom nwere osisi iri abụọ na atọ fọdụrụ. Ọ na-egbutu osisi abụọ kwa áfọ̀, ya mere ọ nwere osisi iri abụọ na atọ fọdụrụ. 30% nke osisi ahụ nwụrụ, ya mere ọ nwere osisi iri atọ na atọ fọdụrụ.</s>

question: Sue bi n'agbata obi na-enye obi anuri. N'otu ngwụcha izu, ndị agbata obi kpebiri ịghọ Sue aghụghọ. N'ụtụtụ Fraịdee, ndị agbata obi debere pinki plastik flamingos iri na asatọ n'ihu ụlọ Sue. N'ụtụtụ Satọdee, ndị agbata obi weghachiri azụ otu ụzọ n'ime atọ nke flamingos, tee ha ọcha, ma tinyeghachi flamingos ndị ọhụrụ a e tere ọcha n'ihu ụlọ Sue. Mgbe ahụ, n'ụtụtụ Sọnde, ha gbakwunyere pinki plastik flamingos iri na asatọ ọzọ na mkpokọta ahụ. N'ehihie na Sọnde, pinki plastik flamingos ole ọzọ ka ewepụtara karịa plastik flamingos ọcha?
llm: <pad> N'ehihie na Sọnde, ndị agbata obi weghachiri azụ otu ụzọ n'ime atọ nke flamingos, tee ha ọcha, ma tinyeghachi flamingos ndị ọhụrụ a e tere ọcha n'ihu ụlọ Sue. N'ụtụtụ Sọnde, ha gbakwunyere pinki plastik flamingos iri na asatọ ọzọ na mkpokọta ahụ, nke mere na e nwere pinki plastik flamingos iri na asatọ ọzọ karịa plastik flamingos ọcha. N'ehihie na Sọnde, ndị agbata obi wepụtara pinki plastik flamingos iri na asatọ ọzọ karịa plastik flamingos ọcha. Nke a bụ n'ihi na ndị agbata obi weghachiri azụ otu ụzọ n'ime atọ nke flamingos, tee ha ọcha, ma tinyeghachi flamingos ndị ọhụrụ a e tere ọcha n'ihu ụlọ Sue. Nke a pụtara na e nwere pinki plastik flamingos iri na asatọ ọzọ karịa plastik flamingos ọcha, nke pụtara na e nwere pinki plastik flamingos iri na asatọ ọzọ karịa plastik flamingos ọcha. N'ihi ya, n'ehihie na Sọnde, ndị agbata obi wepụtara pinki plastik flamingos iri na asatọ ọzọ karịa plastik flamingos ọcha.</s>

question: Violetta chọrọ ịzụta oteji ọhụrụ. Ọ chọrọ ha n'agba ịse dị iche iche ma kwado $20 maka ịzụta nke a. Otu oteji na-ada $2.  Ego ụfọ ole ka ọ ga-anata?

question: Otu mkpisi odee n'erikari ego karia dị ka pensụl na nchicha jikọta ọnụ. Otu pensụl n'efu $1.20 na nchicha n'efu $0.30. Ego ole ka mkpịsi odee asatọ ga-efu?
llm: <pad> Otu mkpisi odee ga-efu $1.20 + $0.30 = $2.30.</s>

question: Narị paund karọt abụọ ka a ga-ekesara ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ dị iri anọ n'otu obodo. Ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ ọbụla ga-anata paund karọt abụọ. Kedụ paund karọt ole a na-agaghị eji eme ihe?
llm: <pad> Ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ iri anọ ga-anata paund karọt abụọ n'otu ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, yabụ a ga-enye ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ iri anọ ahụ paund karọt abụọ n'otu ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, a ga-enyekwa ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ iri anọ ahụ paund karọt abụọ n'otu ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, a ga-enyekwa ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ iri anọ ahụ paund karọt abụọ n'otu ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, a ga-enyekwa ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ iri anọ ahụ paund karọt abụọ n'otu ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, a ga-enyekwa ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ iri anọ ahụ paund karọt abụọ n'otu ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, a ga-enyekwa ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ iri anọ ahụ paund karọt abụọ n'otu ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, a ga-enyekwa ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ iri anọ ahụ paund karọt abụọ n'otu ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, a ga-enyekwa ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ iri anọ ahụ paund karọt abụọ n'otu ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, a ga-enyekwa ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ iri anọ ahụ paund karọt abụọ n'otu ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, a ga-enyekwa ụlọ oriri na ọṅụ

question: N'obodo Soda, e nwere kpọmkwem 23786 ndị bi na ya. Ha gụnyere nwoke 8417 na nwanyị 9092. ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadu ndị ọzọ bụ ụmụaka mejupụtara ha. Kedụ ụmụaka ole nọ na Soda?
llm: <pad> Ụmụaka nọ na Soda bụ 8417 + 9092 = 17487.</s>

question: Elaine nweburu kaadị Pokemon iri abụọ na mbido. Ka otu ọnwa gasịrị, ọ natara ugboro atọ n'ọnụọgụgụ nke ahụ. N'ọnwa nke abụọ, ọ natara kaadị iri abụọ dị nta karịa ndị nke ọ nataara n'ọnwa nke mbụ. N'ọnwa nke atọ, ọ natara kaadị pokemon ọnụọgụgụ ya dị ugboro abụọ n'ole ọ nataara n'ọnwa mbụ na ọnwa abụọ. Kedụ kaadị pokemon ole o nwere ugbu a na ngụkọta?
llm: <pad> Ọ natara kaadị pokemon iri atọ n'ọnwa nke mbụ, nke pụtara na ọ natara kaadị pokemon iri atọ na atọ. N'ọnwa nke abụọ, ọ natara kaadị pokemon iri abụọ dị nta karịa ndị nke ọ natara n'ọnwa nke mbụ, nke pụtara na ọ natara kaadị pokemon iri abụọ na abụọ dị nta karịa ndị nke ọ natara n'ọnwa nke mbụ. N'ọnwa nke atọ, ọ natara kaadị pokemon ọnụọgụgụ ya dị ugboro abụọ n'ọnụọgụgụ nke ọ natara n'ọnwa mbụ na ọnwa abụọ, nke pụtara na ọ natara kaadị pokemon iri abụọ na abụọ dị nta karịa ndị nke ọ natara n'ọnwa nke mbụ. N'ozuzu, Elaine nwere kaadị pokemon iri abụọ na atọ + iri abụọ na abụọ + iri abụọ na atọ = iri abụọ na isii.</s>

question: Mark bụ onye ndezi edemede. Ọ na-edezi nhatanha ọnụ ọgụgụ ahịrịokwu izu uka ọ bụla maka ndị mbipụta abụọ dị iche iche, ha abụọ otunaotu na-akwụ ya ọnụ ego iche iche na ahịrịokwu ọ bụla. Onye mbipụta B na-akwụ Mark ugboro abụọ ihe onye mbipụta A na-akwụ. Mark na-edezi ngụkọta ahịrịokwu otu puku n'izu ụka ọ bụla ma onye mbipụta A na-akwụ ya senti ise na ahịrịokwu ọ bụla. Ego ole ka Mark na-enweta n'izu, na senti?
llm: <pad> Mark na-enweta $1000 / 1000 = $500 n'izu ụka ọ bụla. Onye mbipụta B na-akwụ ya ugboro abụọ ihe onye mbipụta A na-akwụ ya, yabụ ọ na-enweta $500 * 2 = $1,000 n'izu ụka ọ bụla. N'ihi ya, Mark na-enweta $500 + $1000 = $2000 n'izu ụka ọ bụla.</s>

question: Baldur na-enweta mmiri n'olulu mmiri. Ọ na-enweta pelu mmiri ise n'ụtụtụ ọbụla na pelu mmiri isii n'ehihie ọbụla. Ọ bụrụ na pelu otunaotu nwere lita mmiri ise, kedụ lita mmiri ole ọ na-enweta n'ụbọchị ọbụla?
llm: <pad> Baldur na-enweta lita mmiri 5 + 6 = 11 n'ụtụtụ na ehihie. Ya mere, ọ na-enweta lita mmiri 11 * 2 = 22 n'ụbọchị ọbụla.</s>

question: Nri Carl kacha nwe mmasị bụ chiizi. Ọ riri otu Sanwichi kwa ụbọchị n'izu ụka a maka nri ehihie na-ewere iberibe chiizi abụọ na sanwichi ọ bụla. O riri chiizi na omeleti maka nri ụtụtụ ụbọchị atọ n'izu ụka jiri otu iberibe ọzọ kwa omeleti karịa sanwichi. O siri nnukwu nri nke makaroni na chiizi ka o zuoro ya nri abali maka izu uka ahụ ma jiri iberibe chiizi 8 n'ime ya. Iberibe chiizi ole ka o jiri mee ihe?
llm: <pad> Carl riri iberibe chiizi 2 * 2 = 4 na sanwichi. Ọ riri iberibe chiizi 4 + 1 = 5 na omeleti. N'ozuzu, Carl jiri iberibe chiizi 4 + 5 + 8 = 13 n'ime nri ahụ.</s>

question: Janet nwere mkpịsị òdé na-acha ndụndụ iri abụọ na abụọ na mkpịsị òdé na-acha edoedo iri. Mgbe ahụ ọ zụtara akpa mkpịsị òdé na-acha anụnụ anụnụ na akpa mkpịsị òdé na-acha ọbara ọbara. E nwere mkpịsị òdé itoolu n'ịme ọbụla na-acha anụnụ anụnụ na mkpịsị òdé isii n'akpa mkpịsị òdé na-acha ọbara ọbara. Mkpịsị òdé ole ka Janet nwere?
llm: <pad> Janet nwere mkpịsị òdé iri abụọ na abụọ na-acha ndụndụ na mkpịsị òdé iri abụọ na abụọ na-acha edo edo. Ọ zụtara mkpịsị òdé itoolu n'akpa mkpịsị òdé na-acha anụnụ anụnụ na mkpịsị òdé isii n'akpa mkpịsị òdé na-acha ọbara ọbara. N'ozuzu, Janet nwere mkpịsị òdé iri abụọ na abụọ na-acha ndụndụ na mkpịsị òdé iri abụọ na abụọ na-acha edo edo.</s>

question: Michael hụrụ ịnya ịnyịnya ígwè n'anya. Ọ nyara ya opekatampe ugboro ise n'izu ụka ma gbaa kilomita iri abụọ na ise oge ọbụla. O mere nke ahụ izu ụka anọ, mgbe ahụ o kpebiri, ịnya ịnyịnya ígwè ahụ naanị ugboro abụọ n'izu ụka, mana maka kilomita iri isii oge ọbụla, ma mee nke ahụ izu ụka atọ. Kilomita ole ka Michael gbara na ngụkọta?

question: Akpa kandi Halloween Joe nwere chọkọleeti iri abụọ na ise na kandi-apụl iri asatọ. Chọkọleeti ọ bụla ji ugboro abụọ dị arọ karịa ka kandi-apụl ọ bụla. Ọ bụrụ na chọkọleeti ọ bụla di 40g, kedụ ole akpa kandi Joe na-ada, na gram?
llm: <pad> Akpa kandi Joe na-ada chọkọleeti 25 * 40g = 1200g. Akpa kandi Joe na-ada kandi-apụl 8 * 40g = 320g. N'ihi ya, akpa kandi Joe na-ada 1200g + 320g = 1600g.</s>

question: Rose gaara n'ọnụ ụlọahia na Mọndee ma zụta keeki anọ. Tuzdee ọ gaara ụlọahia dị iche iche ma zụta ugboro atọ n'ọnụọgụgụ keeki ahụ. Na Wenezdee ọ gaara ụlọahia ọzọ ma zụta ugboro ise n'ọnụọgụgụ keeki ọ zụrụ na Tuzdee. Kedụ keeki ole ọ zụrụ ka ụbọchị atọ ndị ahụ niile gachara?
llm: <pad> Rose zụrụ keeki 4 * 3 = 12. Rose zụrụ keeki 12 * 5 = 60. N'ozuzu, Rose zụrụ keeki 120 + 60 + 4 = keeki 144.</s>

question: Iko dọzịn iri abụọ pụtara $1200 pekaria ọkara ngụkọta ọnụego dọzin efere e rere $6000 nke ọ bụla. Gbakọọ ngụkọta ọnụ ego ọ ga-efu ịzụta iko ọ bụla.
llm: <pad> Iko dọzịn iri abụọ pụtara $1200 pekaria ọkara ngụkọta ọnụego dọzin efere e rere $6000 nke ọ bụla. Ya mere, ngụkọta ọnụego ọ ga-efu ịzụta iko ọ bụla ga-abụ $6000 / 12 = $600.</s>

question: Sara na-achọ ịzụtara onwe ya jakeeti na akpụkpọ ụkwụ abụọ. Jakeeti ọ chọrọ nọ na ọnụ ahia $30 na otu akpụkpọ ụkwụ nọ na ọnụ ahia $20. Sara na-elekọta ụmụaka onye agbataobi ya ugboro anọ ma na-enweta $5 oge ọbụla o lekọtara ha. Nnenanna ya na-akwụ ya $4 oge ọbụla ọ sụrụ ahịhịa ụlọ. Ọ bụrụ na Sara e nwelarị $10 echekwara tupu o bido ọrụ nlekọta ụmụaka, ugboro ole ka ọ ga-asụriri ahịhịa ụlọ ahụ tupu onwe ị́ké ịzụta jakeeti na akpụkpọ ụkwụ ndị ahụ? .
llm: <pad> Sara na-enweta $5 x 4 = $20 n'ọrụ nlekọta ụmụaka. Ọ na-enwetakwa $4 x 4 = $16 n'ọrụ ịsa ahịhịa ụlọ. Sara nwere $10 - $16 - $10 = $6 n'oge ọrụ nlekọta ụmụaka. Sara ga-asụ ahịhịa ụlọ ahụ ugboro 6 x 4 = 24.</s>

question: Jerry nwere ìgwè ọkụkọ. Ọkụkọ ọbara-ọbara ahu n'eyi akwa atọ n'ụbọchị, na ọkụkọ ọcha n'eyi akwa ise n'ụbọchị. Ụbọchị ọ bụla Jerry na-ekpokọta akwa iri anọ na abụọ. Ọ bụrụ na o nwere ọkụkọ ọcha abụọ karịa ọkụkọ ọbara-ọbara, ọkụkọ ọbara ọbara ole ka o nwere?
llm: <pad> Jerry nwere ọkụkọ ọcha abụọ karịa ọkụkọ ọbara-ọbara, yabụ ọ nwere ọkụkọ ọbara-ọbara abụọ + ọkụkọ ọcha abụọ = ọkụkọ iri na abụọ. Ọkụkọ ọcha ndị ahụ na-eyi akwa ise n'ụbọchị, yabụ Jerry nwere ọkụkọ ọcha iri na abụọ / ise = ọkụkọ iri na abụọ. Jerry nwere ọkụkọ ọbara-ọbara iri na abụọ / iri anọ na abụọ = ọkụkọ iri na abụọ.</s>

question: Mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ ahịa dollar, Sloane na-agụ ndị ahịa otu nari na-abanye n'ụlọ ahịa ahụ. N'echi ya, ọ na-agụ ndị ahịa iri ise karịa ụbọchị mbụ. Ọ bụrụ na ngụkọta ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị ahịa n'ụbọchị nke atọ bụ nari ise, ndị ahịa ole ka ọ gụtara n'ụbọchị nke atọ?
llm: <pad> Sloane gụtara ndị ahịa 100 + 50 = 150 n'ụbọchị nke abụọ. N'ụbọchị nke atọ, ọ gụtara ndị ahịa 150 + 100 = 250.</s>

question: Lori chọrọ ịzụta akpụkpọ ụkwụ $320.00 na eriri nke dabara nke bụ $32.00. Ọrụ nchere oge ya na-akwụ ya $8.00 kwa awa. Awa ole ka ọ ga-arụ ọrụ tụtụ o nwe ike izuta ihe ?
llm: <pad> Lori ga-arụ ọrụ awa 8 kwa awa n'ihi na 320 + 32 = 440. Ọ ga-arụ ọrụ awa 440 n'ihi na 440 / 8 = awa 36.</s>

question: Janeth bitere $2000 ma kwee nkwa ị weghachi ya na ọmụrụnwa 10%. Ọ bụrụ na ọ ga na-akwụ $165 kwa ọnwa maka ọnwa iri na abụọ, kedụ ego ole Janeth ga-akwụfọ oge ahụ?
llm: <pad> Janeth ga-akwụ $2000 *.1 = $210 ọmụrụnwa kwa ọnwa. Ya mere, ọ ga-akwụ $2000 - $210 = $1800 ọmụrụnwa.</s>

question: Enwere rosu anọ n'ime ite ahụ. Enwere dahlia asaa karịa rosu n'ite ahụ. Okooko ole dị n'ite ahụ na ngụkọta?
llm: <pad> Enwere okooko osisi 4 + 7 = 11 n'ite ahụ.</s>

question: Áfọ̀ Adrian ji ugboro atọ karịa áfọ̀ ole Harriet dị, ma Harriet dị ọkara áfọ̀ ole Zack dị. Gbakọọ nkezi afọ ole mmadụ atọ ahụ dị n'ime afọ atọ ma ọ bụrụ na Harriet dị áfọ̀ iri abụọ na otu ugbu a?
llm: <pad> Zack dị áfọ̀ iri abụọ na otu, yabụ ọ dị áfọ̀ iri abụọ na otu - áfọ̀ iri abụọ na otu = áfọ̀ iri abụọ na abụọ. Nkezi afọ mmadụ atọ ahụ n'ime afọ atọ bụ áfọ̀ iri abụọ na abụọ + áfọ̀ iri abụọ na abụọ = áfọ̀ iri abụọ na atọ.</s>

question: Ụmụ akwụkwọ anọ nwetara ngụkọta nke akara nari abụọ na iri ise na otu na-egwuregwu bọọdụ. Naomi nwetara akara iri isii na asatọ. Yuri nwetara iri karịa ọkara ka Naomi na Brianna nwetara akara iri na asaa karịa Naomi. Akara ole ka Jojo nwetara?
llm: <pad> Naomi nwetara akara 66 + 18 = akara iri na asatọ. Yuri nwetara akara 20 + 1/2 = akara iri na abụọ. Brianna nwetara akara 27 + 18 = akara iri na asaa karịa Naomi. N'ihi ya, Jojo nwetara akara 27 + 18 + 21 + 22 = akara iri na asatọ.</s>

question: Ọ na were Carmen nkeji iri ịji mechaa pọzụl krọswọd na nkeji ise ịji mechaa pọzụl sudoku. N'ime ngwụcha izu ụka o mere pọzụl krọswọd atọ na pọzụl sudoku asatọ. Oge ole ka ọ ga-emefu ịji na-azucha okwe ndị a?

question: Otu tanki mmiri ka agbajuru mmiri lita otu nari na iri abụọ. Celine jiri mmiri lita iri itoolu were gbaa n'obere ubi ya. O nweziri ike gbakọta mmiri ozuzo nke jị ugboro abụọ karịa nke fọdụrụ. Lita mmiri ole dị na tankị ahụ ugbu a?
